programme.title: LACMA, modern collection - Los Angeles, USA
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 The World's Greatest Painting Museums - Season 1 - LACMA, modern collection - Los Angeles, USA
programme.desc: The Los Angeles County Museum of Art (LACMA) is the official art museum of Los Angeles. It presents more than 250,000 works, notably on European sculpture and painting. In the modern part, we will see works from Impressionism to Modern Art, the Impressionists have their reserved section with works by Renoir, Cézanne, Van Gogh and Degas. You can find there “La Trahison des images” by Magritte, a portrait of the poet Guillaume Apollinaire by Maurice de Vlaminck, and works by Degas, Mondrian, Modigliani etc. The American Art exhibition covers the period from the 19th century to World War II. This is the museum's oldest collection, and you can see the "Bust of Abraham Lincoln" by George E....

programme.title: Paparazzo - Franco Pinna
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Art investigation - Season 1 - Paparazzo - Franco Pinna
programme.desc: How did an Italian press photo from the 1950s become the icon of the "paparazzi" gesture? The image that became famous has now entered the collections of the Nicéphore Nièpce Museum of Photography in Chalon-sur-Saône. This documentary traces the history of this photograph by Franco Pinna, taken in Rome in June 1952 during an anti-American demonstration. It depicts a demonstrator under arrest under the eye of two reporters perched on a Lambretta, also photographing the scene. A mise en abyme that shows what the objects of the photographic snapshot dear to the paparazzi will be: the Lambretta, the Rolleiflex and the flash. The photo shows the man whom the history of photography considers to...

programme.title: Lissa Rivera
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 The decisive moment - Season 2 - Lissa Rivera
programme.desc: Lissa Rivera is a Brooklyn-based photographer whose work has received numerous awards and accolades and has been exhibited internationally. Lissa's latest project looks at photography's connection to identity on a personal level, focusing on her domestic partner as her muse. Rivera was chosen as a "Woman to Watch" for the biennial exhibition at the National Museum of Women in the Arts.

programme.title: Jennifer Khordi
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 The decisive moment - Season 2 - Jennifer Khordi
programme.desc: In this episode, we'll be talking with Jennifer Khordi, photographer. She is a former computer professional from the Bronx. She started with street photography in the late 1980's and then moved into travel and portrait photography. She has spent the last few years photographing the moon, the Milky Way and New York City.

programme.title: Pop art
programme.desc: At the Halle Saint-Pierre, the Mecca of gross and singular arts, Martine Lusardy, director and curator of the exhibition, guides us behind the scenes of the museum on the occasion of the setting up of the exhibition "Art brut japonais II". From the unpacking of the works to their presentation, the team has to show ingenuity to highlight creations that are often out of frame, unpublished. The spectator discovers the specificity of Japanese raw art and the commitments of a team to show a hidden face of contemporary art.

programme.title: Pop art
programme.desc: This documentary travels to France to question the contours of Raw Art. Savine Faupin, curator of the department Art Brut at LAM, Matthew Morin, connoisseur and collector Christian Berst, owner of the eponymous gallery: each character tries to put his own definition of an art difficult to grasp. Indeed, Raw Art is constantly renewing itself, it is not limited by time or by the style and remains foremost vector emotional message.

programme.title: Amedeo Modigliani
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 The World's Greatest Painters - Season 1 - Amedeo Modigliani
programme.desc: Originally known as a figurative painter, Amedeo Modigliani became famous with his art for his painting and sculptures called modern where face looks like mask and where forms are stretched out. During his career, he was influenced by Toulouse-Lautrec, Paul Cezanne, Picasso, and by the cubism, that allowed him in 1916-1917 to create a famous series including 30 nudes paintings. He usually never modified his painting after making them and they evoke the representation of nudity. However, Modigliani turned to the italiens masters such as Botticelli or Titian.

programme.title: Brussels
programme.desc: Today, Travelers takes you to Brussels in Belgium, the city of beer, French fries, chocolate, and waffles, but also the city of characters like Tintin, Spirou and many others. We will start the visit by the great square of Brussels considered as one of the most beautiful squares in the world. We will walk through the Queen's galleries where we will be able to do some window shopping. We will go to the Palace of Fine Arts of Brussels, but also in a store of comic books which made the reputation of this city.

programme.title: Thyssen Bornemisza museum, modern collection - Madrid, Spain
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 The World's Greatest Painting Museums - Season 1 - Thyssen Bornemisza museum, modern collection - Madrid, Spain
programme.desc: The Thyssen Bornemisza Museum is one of the three major museums in Madrid, along with the Prado and the Reina Sofia. It displays a collection of works of art that covers eight centuries of European creation. It is a museum of ancient, modern and contemporary art. It houses the collection of the Thyssen Bornemisza family and in particular Hans Heinrich Thyssen, heir to one of the largest German fortunes. The modern part of this collection covers the impressionist and modern period up to pop art, presented in chronological order. You will discover works of Delacroix, Monet, Renoir, Degas, Berthe Morisot, Van Gogh, Gauguin, but also works by Dali, Kandinsky and Picasso.

programme.title: Grayson Murray wins the 2024 Sony Open
programme.desc: Grayson Murray captures his second victory on the PGA TOUR after winning the 2024 Sony Open in Hawaii. Murray shot rounds of 69-63-64-67 to finish 17-under par and won the three-man playoff for the title.

programme.title: PGA TOUR
programme.desc: Home of official PGA TOUR news, stats, video, player profiles and tournament information.

programme.title: On the Range | 2024 WM Phoenix Open
programme.desc: Prior to the 2024 WM Phoenix Open, the best players on the PGA TOUR prepare for a showdown at TPC Scottsdale.

programme.title: 2023 The Galleri Classic
programme.desc: Relive the 2023 Galleri Classic, where David Toms climbed back into the winner's circle and claimed his third career PGA TOUR Champions title.

programme.title: Rickie Fowler | Swing Theory | Driver, iron, wedge
programme.desc: Take an enhanced look at the golf swing of Rickie Fowler, with analysis from CBS Sports and PGA TOUR LIVE commentator Mark Immelman, including a deeper breakdown of the six-time PGA TOUR Champion's current driver, iron and wedge swings. Fowler has played on several United States national teams, including five times as a member of the Ryder Cup squad, three times on the Presidents Cup team, twice at the Walker Cup, and once at the Palmer Cup, Eisenhower Trophy, and World Cup.

programme.title: Scottie Scheffler | FULL swing analysis | Driver, iron, wedge
programme.desc: Take an enhanced look at the swing of 2021-22 PGA TOUR Player of the Year Scottie Scheffler, with analysis from CBS Sports and PGA TOUR LIVE Analyst Mark Immelman, including a deeper swing analysis of the nuances of the Texan's driver, wedge, and iron swings, as well as his unique footwork.

programme.title: Seven Days to Sunday | EVERYTHING that goes into THE PLAYERS
programme.desc: Seven Days to Sunday is an in-depth journey into THE PLAYERS Championship 2023 through the eyes of the people that bring it to life. While the PGA TOUR's best take center stage, it is the effort of countless other individuals that make the platform for the players to shine. From caddies to the agronomy team; from rules officials to the volunteers; from tournament directors to the TV crews, this is one of the biggest weeks on the PGA TOUR showcased in a way that fans rarely experience.

programme.title: Rickie Fowler | Swing Theory | Driver, iron, wedge
programme.desc: Take an enhanced look at the golf swing of Rickie Fowler, with analysis from CBS Sports and PGA TOUR LIVE commentator Mark Immelman, including a deeper breakdown of the six-time PGA TOUR Champion's current driver, iron and wedge swings. Fowler has played on several United States national teams, including five times as a member of the Ryder Cup squad, three times on the Presidents Cup team, twice at the Walker Cup, and once at the Palmer Cup, Eisenhower Trophy, and World Cup.

programme.title: On the Range | 2024 WM Phoenix Open
programme.desc: Prior to the 2024 WM Phoenix Open, the best players on the PGA TOUR prepare for a showdown at TPC Scottsdale.

programme.title: The Build Up to the TOUR Championship | PGA TOUR Originals
programme.desc: PGA TOUR ORIGINALS: THE BUILD UP-presented by United Rentals showcases the behind-the-scenes team bringing the PGA TOUR's season ending TOUR Championship to life. Historic East Lake Golf Club in Atlanta, Georgia, is transformed from the ground up as the momentum builds for the crowning of the 2023 FedExCup Champion, Viktor Hovland.

programme.title: Clark wins at Pebble Beach, a look at historic 18th hole | The CUT | PGA TOUR Originals
programme.desc: Wyndham Clark gets his third career win after his victory at a weather-shortened 2024 AT&T Pebble Beach Pro-Am, Jacques Slade takes a deep dive into the stats and strategy behind the historic final hole at Pebble Beach Golf Link, amateur Nick Dunlap declares pro status and Justin Thomas talks about the outcome of his 2023 season and how he feels like he's back on his game all on this week's episode of The CUT.

programme.title: The Turn
programme.desc: Follow four PGA TOUR stars in this inside-the-ropes docuseries that chronicles their attempts to improve their FedExCup standings during the seven-event FedExCup Fall.

programme.title: PGA TOUR
programme.desc: Home of official PGA TOUR news, stats, video, player profiles and tournament information.

programme.title: Every Hole at The Riviera Country Club
programme.desc: An overview of The Riviera Country Club in Pacific Palisades, California.

programme.title: A Round with Tiger | Golf Digest
programme.desc: Tiger Woods welcomes celebrity guests for a round at courses around the country.

programme.title: PGA TOUR Classic Rounds
programme.desc: Watch the final round of The Genesis Invitational in 2021, from The Riviera Country Club.

programme.title: 2023 Chubb Classic
programme.desc: Relive the 2023 Chubb Classic, where Bernhard Langer tied Hale Irwin for the most wins in PGA TOUR Champions history (45), capped off by a 7-under 65 in the final round.

programme.title: 2001 The Genesis Inviatational
programme.desc: Watch The Genesis Invitational 2001, where Robert Allenby survived a six-man playoff to win his third PGA TOUR title at Riviera Country Club.

programme.title: Tiger Woods | Swing Theory | Driver, iron, wedge
programme.desc: An enhanced look at the golf swing of 82-time PGA TOUR winner Tiger Woods, with analysis from CBS Sports' Mark Immelman, including a deeper breakdown of the 15-time major champion's current driver, iron, and wedge swings.

programme.title: The Tiger Effect | PGA TOUR Originals
programme.desc: The Tiger Effect is an in-depth look at the legendary career of Tiger Woods and the influence he has on and off the course. From Tiger's iconic fist pump to his record-breaking achievements, The Tiger Effect celebrates his famous competitive fire and energy. Through his decades in golf, alongside Fred Couples, Justin Thomas, and Tom Kim, The Tiger Effect explores a legacy that will be remembered for generations to come.

programme.title: SLS Unsanctioned 1
programme.desc: The rules are loose, the competitors are hand-picked, and the location is private: world championòNyjah Hustonòis opening up his personal skatepark to ten of the worldís best skaters, includingòIshod Wair,òPaul Rodriguez,òJamie Foyòand more. This A List lineup will go head-to-head - judged by a formidable crew of athletes in their own right, including Huston,òLeticia BufoniòandòKelly Hartò- for the street cred that comes with being the first SLS Unsanctioned Champion.

programme.title: WEC
programme.sub-title: S2023 : E01 Aston Martin's Hypercar: Back in Top Class Endurance Racing
programme.desc: It's true - Aston Martin is officially set to race in WEC & IMSA with its Hypercar Prototype, based on the Aston Martin Valkyrie AMR Pro race car, with The Hearts of Racing team. But with their recent successes in F1, will they be fighting for wins and championships in Endurance Racing? What are the tech specifics about their machinery? And who will drive for the team? Martyn Lee chats with Autosport's Sportscar guru Gary Watkins to find out all the info.

programme.title: Porsche Carrera Cup Germany
programme.sub-title: S2023 : E01 Porsche Carrera Cup Germany - Nürburgring: Race 1
programme.desc: Watch the 2023 Porsche Carrera Cup Deutschland first race at Nürburgring circuit, Germany.

programme.title: F1 Updates
programme.sub-title: S00 : E01 Autosport 2023 F1 Review Part 1 ft. BrrrakeF1
programme.desc: It's time to look back at F1's 2023 season! In a year where Max Verstappen blitzed the competition en route to his 3rd World Championship, we take a look at what happened throughout the year, the battles behind the Red Bull, who made gains, who stumbled and more. To review the teams' performance, Martyn Lee is joined by Blake Hinsey / @brrrake and our own Jonathan Noble.

programme.title: SUPER GT
programme.sub-title: S2023 : E04 SUPER GT: Round 4: Fuji 450km Race
programme.desc: Watch the supercut of Round 4 SUPER GT 2023. The series moves to the first 450km race of the season at Fuji, Japan.

programme.title: F4 Italia
programme.sub-title: S2023 : E02 F4 Italia: Misano: Race 3
programme.desc: Watch the 2023 Italian F4 Championship third race at the Misano Circuit, Italy.

programme.title: LAT: An Enduring Legacy
programme.desc: Since the 1960s, LAT Images has produced the most spectacular motorsport photographs from around the world. We take you behind the scenes of LAT Images and while the technology has changed dramatically, the magic of great photographs remain.

programme.title: WEC
programme.sub-title: S2023 : E01 Aston Martin's Hypercar: Back in Top Class Endurance Racing
programme.desc: It's true - Aston Martin is officially set to race in WEC & IMSA with its Hypercar Prototype, based on the Aston Martin Valkyrie AMR Pro race car, with The Hearts of Racing team. But with their recent successes in F1, will they be fighting for wins and championships in Endurance Racing? What are the tech specifics about their machinery? And who will drive for the team? Martyn Lee chats with Autosport's Sportscar guru Gary Watkins to find out all the info.

programme.title: Gearing Up
programme.sub-title: S00 : E11 Gearing Up: Episode 11 - Stock Car Pro Series, La Carrera Panamericana, Monster Jam, Kaiafas Battle
programme.desc: We kick off this episode with the exhilarating Stock Car Pro Series, the premier motorsports event in Brazil and South America. Our coverage spans two gripping stages held in Buenos Aires, Argentina, and the Velocitta circuit in the municipality of Mogi Guaçu.

programme.title: Porsche Cup Brazil
programme.sub-title: S2023 : E04 Porsche Cup Brazil: Round 4: Goiânia - Race 1
programme.desc: Watch the first race of the fourth round of the 2023 Porsche Cup Brasil at the Autódromo Internacional Ayrton Senna, in Goiânia.

programme.title: Haas VF24: A New Chapter for the F1 Team?
programme.desc: Haas have revealed the first 2024 F1 car - well, sort of. It's their livery on 3D renders, there's no real car to see. But can we gain any details from this on the team's upcoming VF24 car? Bryn Lucas talks to Alex Kalinauckas and Jake Boxall-Legge to discuss Haas' 2024 hopes, what Hulkenburg and Magnussen need to do this year, whether Haas replacing Guenther with Komatsu will help the team, and whether Andretti really should consider buying F1's current American team out.

programme.title: Why F1's Madrid 2026 Circuit NEEDS to Avoid Valencia's Failures
programme.desc: F1 has announced that from 2026, the Spanish GP will be held at a brand-new hybrid street circuit in Madrid for 10 years. But having seen Formula 1 previously try to migrate the Spanish GP circuit to Valencia in 2013, which ended up failing entirely, is Madrid's Spanish GP set to fail as well? Or has F1 learnt from history, and will Madrid be a golden race for Spain? And what about the Circuit de Barcelona-Catalunya's muddy future? Sam Hall and Jon Noble discuss all these points and more.

programme.title: Hamilton's Shock Move to Ferrari - The Deal Is Done
programme.desc: It's now confirmed - Lewis Hamilton will drive for Ferrari in 2025. Following rumours of the move, it's now official that after 12 consecutive seasons, Lewis Hamilton will join Charles Leclerc and Fred Vasseur to try and end Ferrari's Championship drought. How will Hamilton leaving affect Mercedes going forward? Can Lewis and Vasseur's reunion fight Max Verstappen and bring home his 8th title? Bryn Lucas chats with Jon Noble to answer all these questions and more.

programme.title: Hypercar’s Golden Age – WEC 2023 Season Review
programme.desc: The much anticipated 2023 World Endurance season promised larger grids and more manufacturer support as teams like Ferrari, Peugeot, Porsche and Cadillac all joined the Hypercar class in hopes of challenging Toyota for top honors. While Ferrari managed to make history in winning the centenary running of Le Mans, it was a season of learnings up and down the grid as Toyota won their 5th straight Drivers and Manufacturers Championships.

programme.title: Lando Norris EXTENDS McLaren Deal
programme.desc: Following the news of Charles Leclerc signing a new deal with Ferrari. McLaren announced that Lando Norris will also be staying with the team, putting the rest the rumours of his future amid interest from Red Bull.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E01 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 1, Norway - World Strongest Viking
programme.desc: Season 2018 begins with 14 strongest men in the world, all competing for the title. The competition kicks off in Norway. We’ll see typical Viking disciplines, team events and world records in heavy conditions in the land of snow and ice. They will suffer, they will freeze and fight in this first competition of the year for the title that they will carry on their shoulders throughout whole year.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E16 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 16, World Finals (Part 2)
programme.desc: With new places on the calendar, over 16 stages, broadcasting in over 100 countries and in its 13th year, the MLO Strongman Champions League (SCL) can be seen truly as the biggest strongman league in the world. This competition in Portugal is full of memorable performances and strong results and this is the final!

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E02 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 2, Germany - FIBO Power
programme.desc: The next stop in strongest league of the world is muscle capital, largest number of strong shoulders per capichampions league on the planet. It’s a FIBO - the biggest expo on planet Earth and the second stage of 2018 Strongman champions league, in Cologne, Germany.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E03 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 3, Abu Dhabi
programme.desc: For the first time in history, Strongman Champions League will set up competition in Abu Dhabi. The line-up of super athletes, who are part of the SCL, includes former world champions Dainis Zageris (Latvia) & Krzysztof Radzikowski (Poland), current world champion Matjaz Belsak (Slovenia) and biggest strongman in the World Sean O’Hagan (Ireland).

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E04 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 4, Holland (Part 1)
programme.desc: Strongman classic in land where there is no place for anything else excepts strength, fight and endurance. Here are fourteen of the strongest men, fighting for the title of strongest in Holland.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E05 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 5, Holland (Part 2)
programme.desc: We go back to Holland, where former champion Dainis Zageris is in leading position after the first three events. Alongside Radzikowski, he is in this moment favorite for world title, and also leader shirt holder.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E06 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 6, Finland
programme.desc: Stage six of Strongman champions league, 2018 is set back on north, in Finland. Here we have Matjaz Belsak, wearing SCL leader shirt, one of the biggest strongman in the World Mika Torro, fan favorite strongman in all over the World – Will Baggott, and also big name from Baltic – Aivars Smaukstelis

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E07 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 7, Serbia
programme.desc: Twelve strongman, including defending Worldchampion Matjaz Belsak from Slovenia , will compete on “Air spa” for the title of best in homeland country of Tesla, Pupin, Novak Djokovic. Matjaz Belsak is the SCL leader in this competition, chasing his third victory this season.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E08 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 8, Finland - U105 (Part 1)
programme.desc: The World championship in lightweights of the Strongman Champions League bring to us 50 strongmen from all over the world. All athletes are under 105 kilograms and for them this is the step up to the ultimate heavyweights.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E09 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 9, Finland - U105 (Part 2)
programme.desc: In this second stage of the World championship of lightweights we will find out who out of the 12 athletes will win the title in the under 105 kilogram category.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E10 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 10, Romania (Part 1)
programme.desc: The first part of SCL Romania 2018 will be hosted in Brasov. This episode features a new event for Strongman Champion League: “ The Chopper Pull”!

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E11 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 11, Romania (Part 2)
programme.desc: After three classical Strongman events – Dead lift, Loading and Front hold – and one historical, Chopper Pull for the first time in history of Strongman, now we go to find out who will take title in Romania. This is the second stage in Romania and it remains to be seen who will win the title; Aivars, Travis or Krzyzstof?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E12 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 12, Curacao (Part 1)
programme.desc: The next destination of Strongman Champions League is in a piece of paradise on earth – Curacao. We bring to you some special Strongman events like the Rock Lift, Tug of War and Weight for Height in this episode.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E13 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 13, Curacao (Part 2)
programme.desc: This is the last competition before the grand finals. After the first three events Zageris is in top place, but can O’Hagan, Baggott, Petursson and Ortmayer step into the final? Last chance some of them will find through events like Forward Hold, Truck Pull, Dead Lift and loading very big objects.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E14 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 14, Road to Mexico
programme.desc: We bring you 50 minutes of Strongman inside. Fears, inspiration, courage, the best and worst from our finalists and their expectation of the finals. We also go to Poland and Germany to represent one day in the training of Krzysztof Radzikowski and Dennis Kohlruss. See all the finalists for Mexico in their comfort zone here, with their backgrounds /motivations /family and friends.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E01 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 1, World Strongest Viking
programme.desc: This year 14 athletes from all over the world came to Fefor to compete in 6 cruel events. We'll see typical Viking disciplines on very heavy conditions in land of snow and ice, World records and athletes like the title defender Krzysztof Radzikowski, strongest guys from Holland and Germany and many more

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E02 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 2, FIBO Power
programme.desc: The next stop in strongest league of the world is muscle capital, largest number of strong shoulders per capita in the World and of course, the most powerful host in Strongman champions league on the planet. It’s a FIBO - the biggest expo on planet Earth and the second stage of 2019 Strongman champions league, in Cologne, Germany.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E03 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 3, Turkey
programme.desc: On a spectacular beach in Alanya, the MLO Strongman Champions League Turkey was viewed by thousands of spectators over a two day battle. With 12 athletes at the start over 6 cruel events, like Marble Stone Lift, Truckpull and Deadlift cars. And with the comeback of Travis Ortmayer / USA, former stone king and world ranked competitor. Winner of several SCL stages in the past.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E04 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 4, Holland (Part 1)
programme.desc: Four times Strongest Man of Holland, Alex Moonen and the “Flying Dutchman” Kelvin de Ruiter competing here in Holland against 12 other strongest men in the world. There were 6 events in total, and 3 in this episode: The first event, a truckpull of 17.000 kg over 25 meters in max 75 seconds, was a real hard pull Also for the World Champion Truckpull, Holland’s runner-up Kelvin de Ruiter, but watch his amazing technique here.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E05 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 5, Holland (Part 2)
programme.desc: Strongest Man of Holland, Alex Moonen and the “Flying Dutchman” Kelvin de Ruiter, competing in Holland against 12 other strongest men in the world. There were 6 events in total, 3 in this second episode; a Viking-press of 150 kg with the current world record holder Luke Herrick. The fifth event, a front hold of 25 kg is loved or hated by the athletes and lastly, the Stones of Strength.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E06 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 6, Russia
programme.desc: An unbelievable TANK PULL of 50.000 kg was at the stage of SCL RUSSIA. Never seen this before! Not only a tank pull was done here but also the Viking Press/ Deadlift Max and Log lift reps were spectacular events to see here in Russia. With Mikhail Koklyaev also as event presenter, the former top 3 world strongest man from Russia was there

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E07 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 7, Serbia
programme.desc: In this year’s edition on The Balkan Peninsula, we have competing the new talent from Estonia Marko Remlik together with Sebastian Kurek from Poland and yellow leader Kelvin de Ruiter

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E08 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 8, Finland (Part 1)
programme.desc: Mateusz Kieliszkowski from Poland and Aivars Smaukstelis from Latvia are the strongman future of these days. Mateusz is the best man in the World at the moment to defeat. Only 25 years and such a fantastic strongman. They come here only for a win. But there are 12 more Strong athletes in this episode who want the title of Finland as well.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E09 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 9, Finland (Part 2)
programme.desc: Mateusz Is leading after day 1 (previous episode) with close behind him Aivars Smaukstelis and Zake Muluzi from the UK. All very exciting! 5 events in this episode: Log Lift, Fram Walk, Deadlift, Sack Throw (Weight for Height), Loading medley.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E10 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 10, Portugal
programme.desc: In this stage we have a new strong debutant: Oleg Sylka from the Ukraine. He is the new talent, who will stand up against the old champions like ZSydrunas Savickas and Brian Shaw and the Stoltman Brother from the UK. This new talent Oleg is a great character and we will see him flame in the episode in Portugal.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E15 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 15, World Finals (Part 1)
programme.desc: We are in Alanya, on Turkeys south-coast for the final stop at the end of a mammoth season. Here in the sunshine, well finally crown our world champion and what a place Alanya is - you could not ask for a better setting. Aivars Smaukstellis, the reigning world champion is defending his title, and two-time world champion Dainis Zageris is also here, but with a though competition, who will win?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E11 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 11, Callio
programme.desc: In Callio is the deepest mine of Europe/ 1500 meter deep, whereas the MLO Strongman Champions League also did 1 event. The Forward Hold, on a 1500 dept/ also a kind of new record/ as it was never done before. Spectacular and new in Strongman sport.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E12 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 12, Ukraine
programme.desc: Kelvin de Ruiter is here to defend his SCL World Truck Pull Championships title. But this year, another strong field wants his title. Over 3 different pulls with 3 different trucks, and 14 athletes at the start, it will be difficult for everybody.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E13 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 13, Caribbean
programme.desc: SCL edition Curacao 2019 was a great event, twelve power boys from all over made a great show at the white beaches, and 35 degrees Celsius heat in the Carrabean Islands. Two events were held on Friday at the beach of beautiful resort Sunscape, the other three were held near the world famous floating bridge at Willemstad on Saturday night.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E14 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 14, Dubai
programme.desc: Hosted at Meydan Grandstand in Dubai, the Strongman Champions League had some really big names in the list like Mateusz Kieliszkowski from Poland, Brian Shaw from the USA and Krzysztof Radzikowski. In front of the Burj Khalifa the athletes do the deadlift max and 4 other heavy events at another spot in Dubai.

programme.desc: NEOM Titan Desert Saudi Arabia is much more than an MTB race. It is four days of adventure, with constant sporting challenges. A unique experience in which you will test your limits on the bike and share experiences with the rest of the Titans camp.

programme.title: Backcountry skiing at Mcgillivray Lodge (Eng)
programme.desc: In March of 2021, Jeff and a group of friends took a helicopter from Pemberton, which is about 2 hours north of Vancouver, to an area called Whitecap Alpine to stay in the backcountry at McGillivray Pass Lodge for 4 nights and experience 4 great days of backcountry skiing.

programme.title: Aussie 8
programme.desc: Aussie 8 is the adventure of 3 friends who decided to climb the 8 tallest mountains in 8 Australian states in 8 days. To make this possible, they had to put together and respect a very strict timing and logistic organisation.

programme.title: Julbo White Session Zermatt & Chamonix
programme.desc: The unique story of two skiing legends (Sam Anthamatten and Vivian Bruchez) who invite a passionate amateur, Philip Criveli, to climb and ride the north face of the Breithorn (in Zermatt) as well as the Passerelle and Aiguillettes couloirs (in Chamonix).

programme.title: Freeride World Tour 2023 Ep4 Fieberbrunn, Austria
programme.desc: The Freeride World Tour 2023 has its fourth stop in Fieberbrunn, Austria - as always with the best freeriders from all over the world! The first part of the FWT finals takes place in Fieberbrunn, where the athletes have to conquer the imposing Wildseeloder. This mountain is a real test of endurance even for the most experienced pros, and the athletes will certainly have to give it all.

programme.title: Freeride World Tour 2023 Rd3 Kicking Horse Golden BC, Canada
programme.desc: The Freeride World Tour continues in Canada at Kicking Horse Golden BC, (CAN). Known for its champagne powder and long, steep runs, it’s no wonder Kicking Horse attracts riders from all over the globe. The competition takes place on the ever-impressive Ozone Face, offering riders 324 meters of vertical drop and a varied freeride playground of steep terrain, cornices, transfers, and big cliffs. This provides something to suit the different styles of the athletes, who scope out their lines and aim for what could earn a podium finish. In the back of their minds is the cut, which means for many, this would be their last FWT event of the season, and so they have nothing to lose to stay on tour...

programme.title: Freeride World Tour 2023 Rd2 Ordino Arcalis Andorra
programme.desc: The Freeride World Tour 2023 has its second stop in Ordino Arcalís Pro, Andorra - as always with the best freeriders from around the world! Thus, the FWT returns to the freeride Mecca of the Pyrenees. This venue has become a staple of the tour, and for good reason. The playful terrain offers opportunities for explosive action and creative freeride lines. The judging criteria at the Freeride World Tour are: Difficulty of Line, Control, Fluidity, Jumps & Technique

programme.title: Freeride World Tour 2023 Rd1 Baqueira Beret Spain
programme.desc: The 2023 Freeride World Tour kicks off in January in its 16th season – as usual with the best freeriders all over the globe! The first stop of the tour takes place in Baqueira Beret who plays again host, following the success of last year’s inaugural event at this epic venue. Consistent snowfall and varied terrain make this world-class resort an ideal test for freeride fanatics.The judging criteria at the Freeride World Tour are: Difficulty of Line, Control, Fluidity, Jumps & Technique.

programme.title: Skiing China, Exploring Altai Mountains
programme.desc: A quartet of champion skiers and snowboarders from Australia and the USA visit the unexplored Altai Frontier in China, now believed to be the place where skiing first developed, more than 10,000 years ago. They encounter the ancient culture of the region and explore the spectacular local slopes, using their own hi-tech equipment as well as the traditional skis manufactured by local craftsmen using age-old practices. The four visitors, Scott Kneller, Jari Hiatt, Halina Boyd and Harry Kearney, all of whom have world-beating careers in snowboarding, skiing and ski mountaineering, discover new challenges and new frontiers in China’s remote north-western province.

programme.title: A Feather in the West
programme.desc: In September 2019, a team of talented Irish climbers [Chloe Condron, Kevin Kilroy, Michelle O'Loughlin and Conor McGovern] travelled to the small island of Owey to explore sea cliffs that local guidebook writer Iain Miller claims, have “enough new routing potential to last at least twelve lifetimes”. ‘A Feather in the West’ is a film about their trad climbing experiences and the relatively niche pursuit of first ascents, set on the Wild Atlantic Way, off the west coast of County Donegal. (Special thanks to Pertex)

programme.title: Lekkarod 2022 (V. Int)
programme.desc: It is an exceptional line-up of mushers that has an appointment for this seventh edition of the Lekkarod. Coming from France, Germany, Switzerland, Spain and Alaska, 30 teams and 13 participants in the ski-joëring category took part in a total of 9 stages. From Chamrousse (Isère) to Bessans (Savoie) via Val D'Arly, the Lekkarod is an event counting for the IFSS World Cup (International Federation of Sleddog Sports).

programme.title: Summiting Mt Sneffels in Colorado (Eng)
programme.desc: Mount Sneffels is a prominent mountain near Ouray, Colorado in the United States which is over 14,000 feet high, more than 4,300 metres. Audree had never climbed a 14er, so we decided to try reach its summit while on a road trip through Colorado in late-July.

programme.title: Running & Walking
programme.desc: Infinite Nordic walking, hiking, running, trail running, ultra-marathons in natural surroundings ... races, documentaries, exploration ... to get away from the real world.

programme.title: More Than Miles
programme.desc: More than Miles - A journey across America. Race Across America (RAAM) is the world's toughest bicycle race. Competitors challenge themselves and their support crews from the West to East Coast of the USA in a non stop 3089 mile journey. In this film we follow the teams that comprise 4 riders as they race in a relay format in the quest for glory.

programme.title: Promo 1 Mtb Horizonsports 30 Sec
programme.desc: HorizonSports !

programme.title: Santos Tour Down Under 2024 Men
programme.desc: Australia’s greatest cycling race is back to launch the international cycling season. South Australia is celebrated at its best, taking the peloton across 6 stages from world-famous wine country to the dazzling Port Willunga beach and the summit of Mount Lofty.

programme.title: 3d Logo Short 25fps
programme.desc: Info not available

programme.title: Cycling For Autism (Eng)
programme.desc: Whether it was a need for adventure or to stop a life that's going too fast or to reconnect with the essentials, Adrien did a 6-month cycling tour of Europe in 2022. To make the adventure even more beautiful and intense to experience, it was natural for him to associate it with an important cause, and one that is close to his heart : Autism. Xavier is his 15 year old autistic nephew, and as he loves cycling as much as him, Adrien wanted to help the association “Des Rêves pour Xavier” (Dreams for Xavier) to finance an electric tandem. Adrien’s other goal was to raise autism awareness among as many people as possible.

programme.title: Santos Tour Down Under 2024 Women
programme.desc: The Santos Tour Down Under women's race happening in Adelaide-Australia is first on the UCI international cycling calendar. In 2024, the Santos Tour Down Under women's peloton race on a new course. The world's best riders tackle Willunga Hill for the first time as they compete for the Ochre jersey across three stages.

programme.title: 3d Logo Short 25fps
programme.desc: Info not available

programme.title: Super League Triathlon Neom 2023
programme.desc: Catch up on the highlights from Super League Triathlon NEOM. The fourth and FINAL round of the 2023 Championship Series.

programme.title: Wenzhou Triathlon 2023
programme.desc: Welcome to Dongtou for the 2023 Wenzhou Triathlon. We're some 1500 kilometres South of Beijing in the Zhejiang Province, a stunning area made-up of 168 islands in the East China Sea for the travelling triathletes, this is a cultural feast. for the local athletes, it's a proud moment. It's a chance for them to test themselves nationally and internationally.

programme.title: Horizonsports 2021 - Promo
programme.desc: HorizonSports !

programme.title: Racing Georgia - Ep 2 (Eng)
programme.desc: In June of 2022, Jeff travelled to the country of Georgia to compete in a 7-day stage race with Racing the Planet. He'd run 250 km while carrying all of his food and supplies for the week on his back, and this 7-part series documents his entire adventure. It's now time to head to camp for the start of the race and face stage 1.

programme.title: Racing Georgia - Ep 3 (Eng)
programme.desc: The race got off to a bit of a rocky start. But Jeff still managed to finish in second place, and it was now time for stage 2. Jeff is in the former soviet republic of Georgia competing in a 7-day stage race with Racing the Planet. He is running 250 km through a remote region of the country while carrying all of his food and supplies for the week on his back. And now on day two, the competition is starting to heat up.

programme.title: Racing Georgia - Ep 4 (Eng)
programme.desc: Jeff is now on day 3 of a 7-day stage race with Racing the Planet in the former soviet republic of Georgia, where he is running 250 km through a remote region of the country while carrying all of his food and supplies for the week on his back.

programme.title: Racing Georgia - Ep 5 (Eng)
programme.desc: Jeff is on day 4 of a 7-day stage race in the former Soviet republic of Georgia with Racing the Planet where he is running 250 km through a remote region of the country, while carrying all of his food and supplies for the week on his back.

programme.title: Racing Georgia - Ep 6 (Eng)
programme.desc: Racers are now on the longest stage of a 7-day stage race in the country of Georgia with Racing the Planet where they're running 250 km while carrying all of their food and supplies for the week on their backs. The first four days of the race were just a wam-up for today.

programme.title: Racing Georgia - Ep 7 (Eng)
programme.desc: Athletes are on the final stage of a 7-day stage race in the country of Georgia with Racing the Planet as they take their final steps to the cave city of Varzdia after running 250 km while carrying all of their food and supplies for the week on their backs.

programme.title: Promo 2 Running Horizonsports 30 Sec
programme.desc: HorizonSports !

programme.title: Inside UTMB 2022
programme.desc: UTMB is considered the super bowl of trail running, and with over 10,000 metres of elevation gain, it's widely considered to also be one of the most difficult races in the world. This year, Audrée and Jeff would both have the chance to toe the starting line, and this film will show you both of their perspectives with an intimate look at this incredible event.

programme.title: Epic Azores (Eng)
programme.desc: The Azores Islands are a Portuguese archipelago in the middle of the Atlantic ocean. Jeff visited in December of 2022 to run the 60k EPIC Azores trail race on Sao Miguel Island where he'd end up having to battle some pretty tough conditions. He then stayed for two weeks to soak in as much as he could of all the Islands have to offer, including its rugged coastlines, green pastures, lake-filled calderas, and local cuisine.

programme.title: Kite Masters 2023 - Episode 6
programme.desc: Following the exhilarating event in Cagliari, the grand finale of the 2023 KiteFoil World Series unfolded in Zhuhai, China. Drawing top international riders from around the globe, the Lakewood Hills KiteFoil World Series China became the epicenter of anticipation. Riders ventured to Zhuhai, fueled by the prospect of fierce competition in this dynamic venue. Throughout 2023, Kite Masters continued to showcase the epitome of kiteboarding excellence on your TV screens. The sport's evolution is evident with each passing year, mirrored by the advancing skills of the riders. In our coverage, we witnessed the next generation of exceptionally talented athletes, capturing the thrilling moments...

programme.title: The First Second - Samantha Davies
programme.desc: Samantha Davies sees the ocean as a pleasure, obvious. In symbiosis with her boat, she leads a violent struggle with the harsh conditions and "loves it" in an almost inexplicable way! She knows and enjoys her luck, which she shares with Initiatives Cœur. She also measures it to that of her grandfather, a war submariner…. At the start of a race like the Vendée Globe, it is an adventurer who sets off.

programme.title: Horizonsports 2021 - Promo
programme.desc: HorizonSports !

programme.title: GKA Freestyle-Kite World Cup Finals Qatar 2023
programme.desc: The fifth and final call at the Visit Qatar GKA Freestyle-Kite World Cup Finals Qatar plays out at the purpose-built Fuwairit Kite Beach resort’s lagoon, where the men’s and women’s champions are crowned.

programme.title: Copa Kitley GKA Freestyle-Kite World Cup Brazil 2023
programme.desc: The Qatar Airways GKA Kite World Tour is excited to return to Brazil for another Freestyle World Cup event in 2023! It is the fourth call in the Freestyle discipline before the tour heads to Fuwairit, Qatar, for the season finale to crown the world champions. The titles races in all the disciplines are finely poised and wide open. The Brazil stops hold out the prospect of mouthwatering action as the athletes clash to press their bids for the coveted crowns.

programme.title: Kite Masters 2023 Episode 5
programme.desc: Over the years, Poetto Beach has indisputably proven to be a favorite among international riders, offering a stunning backdrop on the south coast of the magnificent Italian island nestled in the Mediterranean. The 2023 KiteFoil World Series' second stop witnessed awe-inspiring performances by elite kiteboarders, leaving spectators in awe. As these remarkable athletes gear up for the upcoming year's Olympic Games, the anticipation and energy continue to build, promising an unforgettable journey in the world of kiteboarding.

programme.title: Copa Kitley GKA Hydrofoil-Freestyle & Kite-Surf World Cup Brazil 2023
programme.desc: The Qatar Airways GKA Kite World Tour is set to land in Cauipe, north-eastern Brazil, for back-to-back stops with world championship crowns up for grabs in two disciplines.The GKA World Cup Brazil crowns the overall winners in the Kite-Surf discipline at the fifth and final stop. The title also is decided in the Hydrofoil-Freestyle discipline in a one-off world championship in Cauipe.

programme.title: The Swimsmith
programme.desc: Join Roderick Smith aka 'Shrek' who is going for what no one has done before --- Triple Crown of Swimming and Ultra Man races. A regular guy with the focus of a superhero, Shrek aims to complete the Triple Crown of Open Water Swimming : Manhattan Island, NewYork - 45kms (Aug 2017) Catalina Channel - 33kms - (Sept 2017) English Channel - 33kms - (July 2018). This documentary is the first part of his journey ... next challenge is the English Channel and the second attempt at Catalina. Once complete Shrek will be the only human to have completed the Triple Crown and done two Ultra Man races.

programme.title: Hugo & Max - The Grand Slam
programme.desc: During the 2022 season of ÖTILLÖ Swimrun the French-Swedish duo Hugo Tormento and Max Andersson set out on the quest to not only win ÖTILLÖ The Swimrun World Championship but to win every single race in the whole World Series. Seven in total.

programme.title: GWA Wingfoil World Cup Dakhla 2023
programme.desc: The GWA Wingfoil World Tour hits Dakhla, Morocco, for a pure Wave event in 2023! Here the Wave discipline is held. The focus of this ground-breaking discipline is riding waves, using the power of the swell to surf with commitment and flow. Scores are also given for aerial tricks, but those must be executed without the power of the wing. It's an engrossing competition and a spectacular addition to the fast-evolving world tour. The top-ranked riders from wingfoil Surf-Freestyle have put their wave-riding skills against their rivals.

programme.title: ÖTILLÖ, The Swimrun World Championship 2023
programme.desc: ÖTILLÖ, The Swimrun World Championship; 60 km trail running and 10 km open water swimming (in pairs) in the wild terrain of the Stockholm archipelago, is considered one of the toughest one-day races in the world.

programme.title: Copa Kitley Qatar Airways GKA Kite-Surf World Cup 2023
programme.desc: The Qatar Airways GKA Kite World Tour hits Rio de Janeiro in Brazil in 2023 for a Kite-Surf world cup event! The second stop of wave tour to debut in Rio de Janeiro with top athletes slated to battle for glory in renowned break. The tour leaders stamped their claim on the crown in the pure wave surfing contest in the legendary break of Cape Verde’s Ponta Preta. But the swell and wind in Saquarema can vary, with the effect that the contest may feature a mix of pure wave kite-surfing and strapless surfboard tricks, depending on the conditions. Thirty-five of the world’s best kite-surfing athletes—25 men and 10 women—from 14 nations around the globe are slated to battle for the crown in...

programme.title: Moana Waiwai - The Film
programme.desc: Moana Waiwai or The Great Ocean in Maori, is about the FreeSwim journey of wahine (woman) Ally Davey as she swims 70km of open ocean around the stunning Coromandel coastline over three days to raise awareness for the protection of New Zealand's oceans. It does more than encapsulate stunning vistas and highlight the extraordinary New Zealand environment. It inspires people to be aware of the natural beauty that surrounds them.

programme.title: Promo 2 Running Horizonsports 30 Sec
programme.desc: HorizonSports !

programme.title: Birna. The Woman Who Swims In Ice
programme.desc: Icelandic ice swimmer Birna Hrönn swims in freezing lakes and seas of Iceland and swimming - without the use of a wetsuit - distances that would seem impossible. We follow Birna as she explores new places to swim and recounts her life, her love of the outdoors and her devotion to the sport of ice swimming. With comments by Ram Barkai, Chairman of the International Ice Swimming Association, on the effects of cold water immersion on the human body, the film shows that nothing is impossible.

programme.title: All The Way (Eng)
programme.desc: From award-winning documentary filmmaker Carl Eneroth at Sthlm Social Innovation Lab comes "All the Way". A heart-pounding, intimate and mind expanding portrait of Swimrun team Pontus Lindberg and George Bjälkemo, as they prepare for their ultimate challenge… winning the 75 km ÖtillÖ Swimrun World Championships in the Stockholm archipelago… in trail shoes and a wetsuit.

programme.title: Nightmare Climbs - Stentaria (Eng)
programme.desc: Our two heroes Emiliano Cantagallo and Patrick Martini go through the door of hell climbing 1011 meters on La Stentaria with an average gradient of 19% which gets worse until reaching the maximum of 32% before finally climbing the hill. We are in Friuli - on the opposite side of the Zoncolan up the pass of the saddle. Seeing is believing......

programme.title: FWT Junior World Championship 2024
programme.desc: The FWT Junior World Championship (FWT JWC) is the highlight of the freeride juniors on ski and snowboard. On January 20th to 26th 2023, the annual highlight of the season takes place in Kappl-Paznaun, Austria. In challenging runs, the junior athletes show spectacular jumps and drops in the terrain as well as challenging lines through the deep snow.

programme.title: 3d Logo Short 25fps
programme.desc: Info not available

programme.title: Engadinsnow 2024
programme.desc: ENGADINSNOW by Dakine is a worldwide unique sports and freeride event, combining innovation and freeriding! It is an outstanding and unique worldwide sports contest and unique regarding the gorgeous Swiss landscape. This parallel freeride event in Silvaplana combines over 20 years of innovation and freeriding. One freeride skier and one snowboarder make up a team in front of a backdrop with the fascinating mountains of the Canton of Grisons.

programme.title: Laax Open 2024
programme.desc: The LAAX OPEN is Europe's most important snowboard event: Since 2005, the January OPEN event in LAAX, Switzerland, has been a living freestyle lifestyle, melding contest with culture. Since 2017, it has been part of the FIS Snowboard World Cup circuit and is considered by numerous riders and teams there as the top favourite event. Performances in slopestyle and superpipe are all set to take the centre stage during the FIS Snowboard & Freeski World Cup. Women, men, on snowboards and freeskis will be soaring high and hurrahing the finest freestyle action.

programme.title: Horizonsports 3dlogo 9 Sec
programme.desc: Info not available

programme.title: Open Faces 2024
programme.desc: The most important Freeride World Tour Qualifier Series in Europe celebrated the start of the 10th season with the 2* FWT Qualifier competition. In challenging conditions the riders show their skills and offer top-class performances on the Quellspitze in Kappl/Paznaun.

programme.title: Highest Peak on Vancouver's North Shore - BRUNSWICK MOUNTAIN (Eng)
programme.desc: We summit Brunswick Mountain, the highest peak on Vancouver's North Shore, followed by Mt. Harvey right next to it. This video was filmed on the traditional, ancestral and unceded territory of the Coast Salish Peoples - Sḵwx̱wú7mesh (Squamish), Tsleil-Waututh & Musqueam First Nations.

programme.title: Swiss Epic 2023
programme.desc: Teams of two compete in Switzerland’s pictures Graubünden region for the overall victory and important UCI mountain bike points at the Swiss Epic. With more than 350km and almost 12,000 meters of altitude, everything is demanded from the best mountain bikers. The route of the SPAR Swiss Epic 2023 leads over the breathtaking trails of Graubünden and crosses the Alps from Lenzerheide to St. Moritz before the event reaches its traditional conclusion in the town of Davos.

programme.title: Backcountry skiing at Mcgillivray Lodge (Eng)
programme.desc: In March of 2021, Jeff and a group of friends took a helicopter from Pemberton, which is about 2 hours north of Vancouver, to an area called Whitecap Alpine to stay in the backcountry at McGillivray Pass Lodge for 4 nights and experience 4 great days of backcountry skiing.

programme.title: Aussie 8
programme.desc: Aussie 8 is the adventure of 3 friends who decided to climb the 8 tallest mountains in 8 Australian states in 8 days. To make this possible, they had to put together and respect a very strict timing and logistic organisation.

programme.title: Julbo White Session Zermatt & Chamonix
programme.desc: The unique story of two skiing legends (Sam Anthamatten and Vivian Bruchez) who invite a passionate amateur, Philip Criveli, to climb and ride the north face of the Breithorn (in Zermatt) as well as the Passerelle and Aiguillettes couloirs (in Chamonix).

programme.title: Freeride World Tour 2023 Ep4 Fieberbrunn, Austria
programme.desc: The Freeride World Tour 2023 has its fourth stop in Fieberbrunn, Austria - as always with the best freeriders from all over the world! The first part of the FWT finals takes place in Fieberbrunn, where the athletes have to conquer the imposing Wildseeloder. This mountain is a real test of endurance even for the most experienced pros, and the athletes will certainly have to give it all.

programme.title: Freeride World Tour 2023 Rd3 Kicking Horse Golden BC, Canada
programme.desc: The Freeride World Tour continues in Canada at Kicking Horse Golden BC, (CAN). Known for its champagne powder and long, steep runs, it’s no wonder Kicking Horse attracts riders from all over the globe. The competition takes place on the ever-impressive Ozone Face, offering riders 324 meters of vertical drop and a varied freeride playground of steep terrain, cornices, transfers, and big cliffs. This provides something to suit the different styles of the athletes, who scope out their lines and aim for what could earn a podium finish. In the back of their minds is the cut, which means for many, this would be their last FWT event of the season, and so they have nothing to lose to stay on tour...

programme.title: Freeride World Tour 2023 Rd2 Ordino Arcalis Andorra
programme.desc: The Freeride World Tour 2023 has its second stop in Ordino Arcalís Pro, Andorra - as always with the best freeriders from around the world! Thus, the FWT returns to the freeride Mecca of the Pyrenees. This venue has become a staple of the tour, and for good reason. The playful terrain offers opportunities for explosive action and creative freeride lines. The judging criteria at the Freeride World Tour are: Difficulty of Line, Control, Fluidity, Jumps & Technique

programme.title: Freeride World Tour 2023 Rd1 Baqueira Beret Spain
programme.desc: The 2023 Freeride World Tour kicks off in January in its 16th season – as usual with the best freeriders all over the globe! The first stop of the tour takes place in Baqueira Beret who plays again host, following the success of last year’s inaugural event at this epic venue. Consistent snowfall and varied terrain make this world-class resort an ideal test for freeride fanatics.The judging criteria at the Freeride World Tour are: Difficulty of Line, Control, Fluidity, Jumps & Technique.

programme.title: Skiing China, Exploring Altai Mountains
programme.desc: A quartet of champion skiers and snowboarders from Australia and the USA visit the unexplored Altai Frontier in China, now believed to be the place where skiing first developed, more than 10,000 years ago. They encounter the ancient culture of the region and explore the spectacular local slopes, using their own hi-tech equipment as well as the traditional skis manufactured by local craftsmen using age-old practices. The four visitors, Scott Kneller, Jari Hiatt, Halina Boyd and Harry Kearney, all of whom have world-beating careers in snowboarding, skiing and ski mountaineering, discover new challenges and new frontiers in China’s remote north-western province.

programme.title: A Feather in the West
programme.desc: In September 2019, a team of talented Irish climbers [Chloe Condron, Kevin Kilroy, Michelle O'Loughlin and Conor McGovern] travelled to the small island of Owey to explore sea cliffs that local guidebook writer Iain Miller claims, have “enough new routing potential to last at least twelve lifetimes”. ‘A Feather in the West’ is a film about their trad climbing experiences and the relatively niche pursuit of first ascents, set on the Wild Atlantic Way, off the west coast of County Donegal. (Special thanks to Pertex)

programme.title: Lekkarod 2022 (V. Int)
programme.desc: It is an exceptional line-up of mushers that has an appointment for this seventh edition of the Lekkarod. Coming from France, Germany, Switzerland, Spain and Alaska, 30 teams and 13 participants in the ski-joëring category took part in a total of 9 stages. From Chamrousse (Isère) to Bessans (Savoie) via Val D'Arly, the Lekkarod is an event counting for the IFSS World Cup (International Federation of Sleddog Sports).

programme.title: Summiting Mt Sneffels in Colorado (Eng)
programme.desc: Mount Sneffels is a prominent mountain near Ouray, Colorado in the United States which is over 14,000 feet high, more than 4,300 metres. Audree had never climbed a 14er, so we decided to try reach its summit while on a road trip through Colorado in late-July.

It's a chance for them to test themselves nationally and internationally.

It's now time to head to camp for the start of the race and face stage 1.

He is running 250 km through a remote region of the country while carrying all of his food and supplies for the week on his back. And now on day two, the competition is starting to heat up.

programme.desc: HorizonSports !

programme.title: Inside UTMB 2022
programme.desc: UTMB is considered the super bowl of trail running, and with over 10,000 metres of elevation gain, it's widely considered to also be one of the most difficult races in the world. This year, Audrée and Jeff would both have the chance to toe the starting line, and this film will show you both of their perspectives with an intimate look at this incredible event.

programme.title: Epic Azores (Eng)
programme.desc: The Azores Islands are a Portuguese archipelago in the middle of the Atlantic ocean. Jeff visited in December of 2022 to run the 60k EPIC Azores trail race on Sao Miguel Island where he'd end up having to battle some pretty tough conditions. He then stayed for two weeks to soak in as much as he could of all the Islands have to offer, including its rugged coastlines, green pastures, lake-filled calderas, and local cuisine.

programme.title: Horizonsports 2021 - Promo
programme.desc: HorizonSports !

programme.title: Nepal - The Other Side of Things
programme.desc: A unique spiritual voyage among the giant Himalayan mountains of Everest and Annapurna along ancient paths and across rivers, capturing the local beliefs to discover the marvels of an ancient mountain people in order to understand the meaning of self.

programme.title: Inside my borders - Sicily (Eng)
programme.desc: Michele, our backpacker friend, is forced to travel inside his Italian borders due to the travel restrictions following the Covid crisis. This time no biking but a long walk across Sicily on the Magna Via Francigena from Palermo to Agrigento, an ancient road already used by the Romans as early as in the 2nd century BC. This is a 187 km walk divided into 9 stages. All along the way, Michele enjoys gorgeous natural scenery, lots of hills and climbs, prehistoric sites, beautiful villages such as the famous Corleone, Prizzi, Sutera and several others. He will also have the pleasure to taste the famous Cannoli and several other gastronomic Sicilian specialties.

programme.title: Twenty-one Twelve
programme.desc: Katie Visco challenges herself to complete a first ever bike supported 2,112 mile run across Australia and documents all the fun and grueling moments in a first release of Twenty One Twelve. The epic adventure starts in Darwin and ends in Adelaide, 119 days later……

programme.title: Georgia on my bike - Part 1 (Eng)
programme.desc: Il primo episodio del favoloso giro in bicicletta di Mike Sanna attraverso le montagne del Caucasus in Georgia, a partire dall'antica chiesa della Trinità nel nord del paese a Gergeti e attraverso Kazbegi, dirigendosi a sud attraverso il selvaggio e bellissimo entroterra georgiano The first episode of Mike Sanna's fabulous bike packing ride through the Caucasus mountains of Georgia starting with the ancient church of the Trinity in the north of the country in Gergeti, and through Kazbegi, heading south through the wild and beautiful Georgian outback

programme.title: Georgia on my bike - Part 2 (Eng)
programme.desc: Michele Sanna continues his cycling journey through Georgia. With him we discover many natural and historical sites such as the monastery of Puzdnari, the wine-growing and mountainous region of Tianeti or the national park of Vashlovani. Michele Sanna continua il suo viaggio in bicicletta attraverso la Georgia. Con lui scopriamo molti siti naturali e storici come il monastero di Puzdnari, la regione vinicola e montuosa di Tianeti o il parco nazionale di Vashlovani.

programme.title: Georgia on my bike - Part 3 (Eng)
programme.desc: Michele continues his journey through Georgia. He must now cross the whole country from east to west to reach the Black Sea, the ultimate goal of his trip. He visits many historical sites such as the David Gareja Monastery, the troglodyte city of Vardzia or the castle of Akhaltsikhe. His journey takes place in the middle of impressive natural settings such as the colorful mountains or Lake Paravani. Michele continua il suo viaggio attraverso la Georgia. Ora deve attraversare l'intero paese da est a ovest per raggiungere il Mar Nero, la meta finale del suo viaggio. Visita molti siti storici come il monastero di David Gareja, la città troglodita di Vardzia o il castello di Akhaltsikhe. Il...

programme.title: From The South Up - The Film
programme.desc: Brendon Tyree, a photographer and ex elite bicycle racer from Sheffield in the UK is turning one of those old dreams into reality : to ride on his bike the length of South America. His trip starts off at the bottom of the world in Chile’s extreme south, and then ride north through a constantly changing landscape of Glaciers, Deserts and Salt flats followed by the high Andean Mountains and the Amazon Rain Forest before finally finishing up on the Caribbean coast of Colombia.

programme.title: Sunshine Coast Trail - Fastpacking 115 km in 3 Days
programme.desc: The Sunshine Coast Trail is Canada’s longest hut-to-hut hiking trail, just 5 hours North of Vancouver, BC. It’s a unique and beautiful backcountry experience that stretches 180km from Sarah Point to Saltery Bay, along coastal shorelines, through old growth forests, and up to panoramic mountaintops. Early June of 2019, my friend Adam and I planned on fastpacking a large portion of the trail, starting from Powell River and running 115 km back to Saltery Bay. Our primary goal was to train and test out our ultralight gear for our upcoming 5-day fastpacking adventure on the Tahoe Rim Trail a few weeks later.

programme.title: The Porter - The Film
programme.desc: A young privileged American attempts to make history at Everest by becoming one of the first ever foreign-born Porters to aid a Mt. Everest expedition. But in doing so, experiences a world far above his head. This is an inside look at the darker side of Everest. At the strength, pride and pain of those who support it. And at just how hard it is for a naive foreigner to attempt the same. This is the Porter.

programme.title: Road to Stardom: Matt Fitzpatrick - 2013 U.S. Amateur
programme.desc: 100 years after Francis Ouimet's watershed victory in the 1913 U.S. Open at The Country Club, Matt Fitzpatrick was trying to make history of his own at that very same place, with eyes on becoming England's first U.S. Amateur champion since 1911.

programme.title: 2021 U.S. Open Highlight Film: Rahm Shines at Torrey Pines
programme.desc: Jon Rahm had already seen success at Torrey Pines during his young career. One week there in June, however, would launch him to the top of the golf world.

programme.title: 2021 U.S. Women's Open: Saso Strikes Gold at Olympic
programme.desc: Young phenoms and established stars battling on Sunday. An iconic championship venue. The 2021 U.S. Women's Open had it all. Here's how is unfolded during a historic week at The Olympic Club.

programme.title: 2020 U.S. Open Film: Bryson's Breakthrough at Winged Foot
programme.desc: Already one of the top young players in the game, in 2020 Bryson DeChambeau added to his arsenal length the likes of which nobody in professional golf had ever seen. What transpired at Winged Foot Golf Club will be talked about for years to come.

programme.title: 2019 U.S. Open Film: "Woodland Peaks At Pebble Beach"
programme.desc: The exclusive, 60-minute edition of the film that chronicles Gary Woodland's unforgettable triumph. In partnership with Rolex.

programme.title: 2018 U.S. Open Film: Brooks Goes Back to Back
programme.desc: See how the drama unfolded at Shinnecock Hills as Brooks Koepka became the first player since 1989 to successfully defend his U.S. Open title.

programme.title: 2017 U.S. Open Film: Golf's Newest Star
programme.desc: Brooks Koepka rose to the top of the pack at Erin Hills, fast-tracking his ascent to the game's elite.

programme.title: 2016 U.S. Open: DJ's Major Redemption
programme.desc: 2016 U.S. Open: DJ's Major Redemption

programme.title: 2015 U.S. Open Film: Spieth's Northwest Conquest
programme.desc: Jordan Spieth entered the U.S. Open at Chambers Bay as the talk of the golf world. He left as the 115th U.S. Open champion.

programme.title: 2014 U.S. Open Film: "Perfection at Pinehurst"
programme.desc: The story of the 2014 U.S. Open, which saw Germany's Martin Kaymer lap the field on the restored Pinehurst No. 2 with a performance for the ages.

programme.title: 2013 U.S. Open: "A Rose Blooms At Merion"
programme.desc: After four days of unforgiving golf at historic Merion Golf Club, it was Justin Rose who finally fulfilled a lifelong dream.

programme.title: 2011 U.S. Open Film: "Rory's Capitol Success"
programme.desc: Following heartbreak after the Masters, young phenom Rory McIlroy bounced back to deliver one of the most dominant performances in U.S. Open history at Congressional Country Club.

programme.title: 2011 U.S. Women's Open: Ryu Shines Over the Broadmoor
programme.desc: 21-year-old So Yeon Ryu burst onto the scene with a playoff victory in the 2011 U.S. Women's Open at The Broadmoor.

programme.title: 2010 U.S. Open Film: McDowell Right at Home
programme.desc: Graeme McDowell became the second consecutive U.S. Open champion from Northern Ireland, winning at Pebble Beach by one stroke.

programme.title: 2010 U.S. Women's Open Film: "Creamer Conquers Oakmont"
programme.desc: Freshly removed from thumb surgery, Paula Creamer won her first major championship, cruising to a four-stroke victory at Oakmont (Pa.) Country Club.

programme.title: 2000 U.S. Open Film: "Tiger's Roar"
programme.desc: Already a six-time USGA champion, Tiger Woods won his first U.S. Open in historic fashion, posting a major-championship record 15-stroke victory at Pebble Beach.

programme.title: 2008 U.S. Open Film: "A Duel For the Ages"
programme.desc: Ninety-one holes. A broken leg. A veteran pro looking to break through. When Tiger Woods and Rocco Mediate battled at Torrey Pines for the 2008 U.S. Open title, they created memories that would last forever.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: GLORY 45: on September 30, 2017 at the Sporthallen Zuid in Amsterdam, Netherlands. This event features a fight between Robin van Roosmalen and Serhiy Adamchuk for the Glory Featherweight Championship as Glory 45: Amsterdam headliner, and a Welterweight pairing between Nieky Holzken and Yoann Kongolo as co-headliner. This event also features a 4-Man Light Heavyweight Contender Tournament to earn a shot at the Glory Light Heavyweight Championship. An injury suffered during training has forced former welterweight champion Nieky Holzken out of the bout against Alim Nabiev.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: GLORY Kickboxing’s Summer of GLORY concluded with a massive event from the Johan Cruijff Arena in Amsterdam. In the night’s headliner, heavyweight champion Rico Verhoeven took on Brazilian challenger Guto Inocente. Verhoeven had defended his belt seven straight times since capturing the title in 2014. His winning streak inside the GLORY ring stood at 16. Inocente looked to dethrone the world’s top-ranked heavyweight riding the momentum of wins over Benjamin Adegbuyi, D’Angelo Marshall and Hesdy Gerges. programme.title: Supercars
programme.desc: These days there's hardly a car manufacturer who doesn't build any kind of SUV. Three of the sportiest SUVs on the market are the Porsche Macan Turbo, Mercedes GLA 45 AMG and Audi RSQ3. Each of them comes with more than 300 HP.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.desc: The Porsche Panamera Turbo S is the most dynamic sedan in the world. No other car finds the perfect balance between calm gliding on the one hand and extreme performance on the other hand.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.desc: Supercars drives the new LS 600h, the BMW Actiev Hybrid 7, and the Porsche Panamera S E-Hybrid. Luxury does not necessarily mean to waste time.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.desc: The Slivretta Hochalpenstrasse in Austria is the ideal playground for the Lotus Elise and the Roding Roadster.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.desc: Most people associate Aston Martin with James Bond, luxury, style, and elegance. The Vantage N430 is a sports car that makes you feel the heritage of British race cars. It is elegant, fast, comes with a marvelous sound.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.desc: Mercedes presents its first plug-in hybrid car with the S500. With an electric range of 33 kilometers, a declared average consumption of 2.8 liters, and a system output of 442 horses the S500 is the most efficient luxury car on the market.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.desc: A rare look behind the scenes at some of the planet's most exclusive factories.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.desc: British cars are considered as elegant, exclusive, and extremely stylish. The Bentley Continental GT Speed is a coupe with an enormous driving performance: 625 hp, 820 Nm and all-wheel drive.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.desc: They are big, they are heavy, and they embody the American way of drive. A look at luxury SUVs like the Cadillac Escalade or uber-pick-ups like the Dodge RAM.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.desc: Turn something good into something especially individual: that's the motto of vehicle tuner. The tuning company MTM from Wettstetten near Ingolstadt got to work on the Audi S8, created a striking outfit for the simple sports sedan.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.desc: More than 10 years ago the 1,000 hp Bugatti Veyron started a new era of super sports cars. Now almost all renowned manufacturers offer their own supercar.

programme.title: Land Rover Experience Tour
programme.desc: Every other year, the Land Rover Experience Tour invites adventurers to explore the world's most remote areas. In 2017, it's time for next tour. The destination: Peru. 30,000 people applied, but only six of them qualified.

programme.title: Supercars

programme.title: Supercars
programme.desc: In a city that loves to show off wealth and luxury, the Dubai police are eager to represent this image via its fleet of patrol cars that includes a Chevrolet Camaro, Lamborghini Aventador, Bentley GT, Ferrari FF, and Mercedes SLS.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.desc: Aerodynamics influence the performance, track stability and dynamics of a vehicle. Takes a look at the Porsche 911 Turbo S, the BMW M6 convertible and the Kelleners 330d in order to explore the influence of different wings and spoilers.

programme.desc: MotorStories

programme.title: MotorStories
programme.desc: German entrepreneur Tillmann Miritz loves vintage cars and has one dream: A trip through the USA with his Mercedes Cabriolet 280 SE 3.5. But before he can make his dream come true, he needs to get his car across the French Riviera.

programme.title: MotorStories
programme.desc: Tillmann starts his dream journey in New York, the city that never sleeps; with his Mercedes 280 SE convertible he visits the legendary classic car dealer Eliot Cuker who made his fortune with his passion for old cars.

programme.title: Track Masters

programme.title: Track Masters

programme.title: Track Masters
programme.desc: The track at Nuerburgring is used for bike riding and running.

programme.title: Classic Races

programme.title: Stunt Heroes
programme.desc: One stuntman has to go head over heels in his car, while two colleagues combine a car chase with a fistfight.

programme.title: Stunt Heroes

programme.title: Perfect Ride

programme.title: Perfect Ride

programme.title: MotorStories
programme.desc: Kati and Patrick from Munich are huge fanas of US cars and proud owners of a 1972 Chevrolet Chevelle. But they are no longer satisfied with its 5.7-liter small block and want to buy a bigger engine.

programme.title: MotorStories
programme.desc: Paaren / Glien near Berlin is host to the yearly Oldtimer Show. It attracts around 45,000 visitors, who are able to gaze at more than 5000 automobile treasures. Frank and his crew from Special Cars Berlin attend the event.

programme.title: MotorStories

programme.title: Eyes of the World - Hero: Brandi Chastain + Record Breaker: Marta
programme.desc: The FIFA Men’s and Women’s World Cups create iconic footballing moments like no other tournaments on the planet. Moments that capture the attention of the entire watching world. ‘Eyes of the World’ explores the stories behind these moments, showcasing the joy and the sadness, the genius and the artistry, the scandal and the rivalries.

programme.desc: A review of key moments in the biggest women’s sporting event in the World, both on and off the pitch. 32 teams descend on Australia and New Zealand in a bid to become champions of the World.

programme.title: FIFA World Cup™ Matches That Astonished the World 11

programme.title: HD CUTZ, Reece James, Jordan Lukaku and Rabbi Matondo
programme.desc: HD Cutz visits Reece James before heading to Antwerp to see Jordan Lukaku and Rabbi Matondo. HD Cutz is back on his travels both near and far as he visits long,time client Reece James in Surrey before flying out to Antwerp to meet up with Jordan Lukaku and Rabbi Matondo.

programme.title: CAPTAIN FANTASTIC, Mid-Game
programme.desc: The second episode of the series follows Sunil Chhetri as he starts to perform wonders for his national team, and slowly becomes a fixture. Meanwhile, he pursues his big dream — to play professional football for a top,class overseas club. Triumphs and tribulations follow, as he sees some dreams fulfilled — and others broken.

programme.title: FIFA Women's World Cup™ Great Finals
programme.desc: Relive the decisive matches between Germany and Norway in Sweden 1995™ and the United States against the Netherlands in France 2019™.

programme.title: ICONS, Asisat Oshoala

programme.title: Morocco v Portugal | Quarter-finals | FIFA World Cup 2022 | Full Match Replay
programme.desc: Watch the full match replay between Morocco and Portugal played at Al Thumama Stadium, Doha on Saturday, 10 December 2022 at 18:00.

programme.title: Nadeshiko
programme.desc: How the Japanese country overcame all odds to win the 2011 FIFA Women's World Cup. In the wake of the 2011 earthquake and tsunami, the Japanese women's football team captured and lifted the spirits of the nation by triumphing in the FIFA Women's World Cup.

programme.title: Cristiano Ronaldo in the FIFA World Cup™

programme.title: LIFE IN SPAIN, Shinji Okazaki

programme.title: USA v Algeria | Group C | 2010 FIFA World Cup South Africa™ | Full Match Replay

programme.title: 1958 Official Film, Hinein
programme.desc: Roller coasters and bagpipes, fishing and dancing, tequila and steak, art and castles, darts, golf and tennis feature in this enrapturing look at how players and supporters enjoyed themselves off the pitch at Sweden 1958. The film also focuses on some unforgettable on,the,field stories, such as Just Fontaine’s record 13,goal campaign and the explosion on to the global scene of two of the greatest performers of all time: Garrincha and Pele.

programme.title: Germany FR v England | Quarter-finals | 1970 FIFA World Cup Mexico™ | Full Match Replay

programme.title: CAPTAINS, The chosen few

Jamaica captain Andre Blake must unite a team of players, all with big ideas and bigger egos.

programme.title: CAPTAIN FANTASTIC, Extra Time
