programme.title: Dolphins and Gannets
programme.desc: Cape Gannets are tough hunters, flying over the coasts for their favorite prey: shoals of sardines, waiting for a surprising ally: dolphins.

programme.title: Amboseli Elephants
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Da Vinci and WaterBear Present: Wildlife Warriors
programme.desc: Dr. Paula Kahumbu goes to Amboseli National Park to learn about elephants from Wildlife Warriors Norah Njiraini and Katito Saiyalel.

programme.title: Vulturine Guinea Fowls
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Da Vinci and WaterBear Present: Wildlife Warriors
programme.desc: Dr. Paula Kahumbu joins Wildlife Warrior Brendah Nyaguthii at Mpala Research Centre, to learn about the vulturine guinea fowls.

programme.title: Spirit Creatures
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Da Vinci and WaterBear Present: Wildlife Heroes
programme.desc: To help them in their struggles, Northern Mozambique’s Cyao people call on their ancestral spirits, some of whom are embodied in animals.

programme.title: School for Whales
programme.desc: Follow a family of sperm whales in the heart of the Indian Ocean. We will lift the veil on the largest-toothed predator on earth.

programme.title: African Animal Rescue
programme.desc: Manyoni Private Game Reserve staff passionately care for endangered animals. Their every day brings surprises.

programme.title: LIKE BUTTON | The Unintended Consequences of the Facebook Like Button
programme.desc: When first presented with the like button (then dubbed “the awesome button”) Facebook CEO Mark Zuckerberg had a simple response: “No.”

programme.title: CUBICLE | How the Cubicle Became Universally Hated
programme.desc: Designer Robert Propst envisioned "The Action Office" to unleash a knowledge worker's potential, a futuristic workplace utopia.

programme.title: Nature That’s ‘Plane’ to See
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Xploration Nature Knows Best
programme.desc: Danni Washington flies planes in tight formation to mimic the flight patterns of birds. How exactly did birds inspire the first airplanes?

programme.title: Amboseli Elephants
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Da Vinci and WaterBear Present: Wildlife Warriors
programme.desc: Dr. Paula Kahumbu goes to Amboseli National Park to learn about elephants from Wildlife Warriors Norah Njiraini and Katito Saiyalel.

programme.title: Vulturine Guinea Fowls
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Da Vinci and WaterBear Present: Wildlife Warriors
programme.desc: Dr. Paula Kahumbu joins Wildlife Warrior Brendah Nyaguthii at Mpala Research Centre, to learn about the vulturine guinea fowls.

programme.title: Spirit Creatures
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Da Vinci and WaterBear Present: Wildlife Heroes
programme.desc: To help them in their struggles, Northern Mozambique’s Cyao people call on their ancestral spirits, some of whom are embodied in animals.

programme.title: School for Whales
programme.desc: Follow a family of sperm whales in the heart of the Indian Ocean. We will lift the veil on the largest-toothed predator on earth.

programme.title: African Animal Rescue
programme.desc: Manyoni Private Game Reserve staff passionately care for endangered animals. Their every day brings surprises.

programme.title: The Mystery Of The Longest Living Vertebrate
programme.desc: New information from the eye of the Greenland Shark confirms it is the longest living vertebrate on Earth.

programme.title: Exoplanets
programme.desc: NASA's Spitzer Telescope takes us closer to answering: Are we alone? Groundbreaking discovery of Earth-like exoplanets.

programme.title: Australia’s Possum Wars
programme.desc: People in Australia’s cities can’t decide how they feel about their closest neighbors, the brush-tailed possums.

programme.title: Devils Hole
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Underwater Wonders of the National Parks
programme.desc: Aside from its peculiar location, this complex cave system is home to the rarest fish in the world, the Devils Hole Pupfish.

programme.title: Water - Rachelle Simpson
programme.desc: Rachelle Simpson is a cliff diver from the United States and has recently won the world series trophy for the second time in a row.

programme.title: Emelie Forsberg
programme.desc: Emelie Forsberg from Sweden is a ski mountaineer and mountain runner. For her, it's the ultimate escapism.

programme.title: Grassroots
programme.desc: Ultimate Goal kicks off at Dulwich Hamlet FC as the coaching team meet the squad. Plus, Joe Cole shares an attacking masterclass.

programme.title: Animal-Free Animal Products With Cellular Agriculture

programme.title: Satellites

programme.title: Eggs

programme.title: Hot Hot Heat

programme.title: The Black Women's Club Movement

programme.title: Homes Under The Hammer

programme.title: Homes Under The Hammer
programme.desc: A retired navy man and his family renovate a flat in Port Glasgow while developers in Derbyshire and Kent try and make money on their terraced houses.

programme.desc: Martin looks round a tiny rundown flat in Chelsea which experts reckon could command a price tag of a million pounds if its done up well.

programme.title: Homes Under The Hammer

programme.title: Homes Under The Hammer

programme.title: Homes Under The Hammer

programme.title: Homes Under The Hammer
programme.desc: Martin and Lucy travel up and down the country visiting houses sold under the hammer. Lucy catches up with developers who had planned to build several houses on one plot in Surrey while Martin looks around terraced houses in Staffordshire and Cumbria.

programme.title: Homes Under The Hammer
programme.desc: A studio flat in London, a cottage by a Derbyshire canal and a mid-terrace in South Wales all go under the Hammer. Martin and Lucy can see potential in all of the properties and have plenty of ideas on how to add value.

programme.title: Homes Under The Hammer

programme.title: Homes Under The Hammer
programme.desc: Martin looks around terraced projects in Staffordshire and South Wales while Lucy looks at a small, rundown detached cottage on a large plot in Surrey with huge potential.

programme.title: Homes Under The Hammer

programme.title: Homes Under The Hammer

programme.title: Homes Under The Hammer

programme.title: Homes Under The Hammer

programme.title: Homes Under The Hammer

programme.title: Homes Under The Hammer

programme.title: Homes Under The Hammer

programme.title: Color Science
programme.sub-title: S02 : E07 Xploration DIY Sci S2 - "Color Science"
programme.desc: Steve Spangler reveals the secrets of color, with amazing experiments you can do at home. He’ll show you how to create clouds of color with rainbow powders. Plus, what ink manufacturers don’t want you to know about how they create colors.

programme.title: Hardware
programme.sub-title: S02 : E08 Xploration DIY Sci S2 - "Hardware"
programme.desc: Here are amazing projects – based on science – that you can build yourself, all with things you can buy at a hardware store. Host Steve Spangler shows how to create your own t-shirt launcher. Plus, discover the substance that makes jelly slide.

programme.title: Kyrgyzstan’s Space School
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Women Make Science S1 - "Kyrgyzstan’s Space School"
programme.desc: In a country where girls are often kidnapped and forced to marry, a defiant all-girls space-tech school are building Kyrgyzstan’s first satellite.

programme.title: Ecuador’s Hidden Treasure
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Women Make Science S1 - "Ecuador’s Hidden Treasure"
programme.desc: Three women scientists take on Ecuador’s endangered spider monkeys and empower indigenous women, in a scientific area usually dominated by men.

programme.title: Randomness & Probability
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Proof of Concept S1 - "Randomness & Probability"
programme.desc: Comedian Maz Jobrani & Blackjack legend Mike Aponte play the odds, meanwhile, Dianna finds order in chaos, and just maybe hacks the stock market.

programme.title: Conceiving Consciousness
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Proof of Concept S1 - "Conceiving Consciousness"
programme.desc: Simone Giertz, Reggie Watts, & Naomi Fitter, join Dianna for an exploration of what consciousness is & whether it can ever be understood. Also, a robot tells jokes.

programme.title: Falling
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Science of Thrills S1 - "Falling"
programme.desc: Engineer and adventurer Rob Bell discovers how our fear of falling is exploited by some of the world’s top theme park rides.

programme.title: Height
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Science of Thrills S1 - "Height"
programme.desc: Engineer and adventurer Rob Bell climbs aboard four spectacular rollercoasters in Europe and America that exploit our fear of heights.

programme.title: Inversion
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Science of Thrills S1 - "Inversion"
programme.desc: Engineer and adventurer Rob Bell investigates four roller coasters in Europe and America that use inversions, or loops, to create thrilling rides.

programme.title: Crazy Science Tricks
programme.sub-title: S02 : E02 Xploration DIY Sci S2 - "Crazy Science Tricks"
programme.desc: Host Steve Spangler shows you wacky experiments where the science is smart, but the tricks are crazy. Like, how to make a can of potato chips fly. Or, how to survive a swinging bowling ball on a rope, aimed right at your head!

programme.title: Food Science
programme.sub-title: S02 : E03 Xploration DIY Sci S2 - "Food Science"
programme.desc: Host Steve Spangler shows you science you can eat! Discover new ways to create colorful, sweet dessert toppings, slimy spaghetti and even ice cream.

programme.title: More Science Magic
programme.sub-title: S02 : E04 Xploration DIY Sci S2 - "More Science Magic"
programme.desc: What’s the secret to lying on a bed of nails? How can you magically restore broken glass? Host Steve Spangler shows you amazing magic tricks all based on science.

programme.title: DIY Toys
programme.sub-title: S02 : E05 Xploration DIY Sci S2 - "DIY Toys"
programme.desc: You can create the world’s most amazing bubbles. Or a Mystery Can that seems to move on its own. Host Steve Spangler shows you toys you can make at home, all based on science.

programme.title: Electricity
programme.sub-title: S02 : E06 Xploration DIY Sci S2 - "Electricity"
programme.desc: Find out how to create a fire… with lemons! Discover how to survive touching 50,000 volts of electricity. Host Steve Spangler has experiments you can do at home, all based on the science of electricity.

programme.title: Color Science
programme.sub-title: S02 : E07 Xploration DIY Sci S2 - "Color Science"
programme.desc: Steve Spangler reveals the secrets of color, with amazing experiments you can do at home. He’ll show you how to create clouds of color with rainbow powders. Plus, what ink manufacturers don’t want you to know about how they create colors.

programme.title: Birds
programme.desc: Host Alex heads to Arkansas, USA to investigate a Bird Apocalypse where the bodies of thousands of blackbirds rained down from the sky.

programme.title: Kyrgyzstan’s Space School
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Women Make Science S1 - "Kyrgyzstan’s Space School"
programme.desc: In a country where girls are often kidnapped and forced to marry, a defiant all-girls space-tech school are building Kyrgyzstan’s first satellite.

programme.title: Ecuador’s Hidden Treasure
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Women Make Science S1 - "Ecuador’s Hidden Treasure"
programme.desc: Three women scientists take on Ecuador’s endangered spider monkeys and empower indigenous women, in a scientific area usually dominated by men.

programme.title: Louisiana
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 The Demolition Man S1 - "Louisiana"
programme.desc: Explosive demolition of the O. K. Allen Bridge.

programme.title: Lewisham
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 The Demolition Man S1 - "Lewisham"
programme.desc: A council flat in Lewisham must come down quickly and without harming the local residents’ flats situated only metres away.

programme.title: Paris
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 The Demolition Man S1 - "Paris"
programme.desc: Two high-rises in Meaux have to be demolished without endangering the surrounding people and buildings.

programme.title: Belgium
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 The Demolition Man S1 - "Belgium"
programme.desc: In this episode a 170 meter tower is imploded! The structure is close to a public highway so there’s an extra element of concern for local safety.

programme.title: The Best of Part 1
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 The Demolition Man S1 - "The Best of Part 1"
programme.desc: Brendan Moar is here to uncover the people and machinery behind the worlds most dangerous and captivating demolitions.

programme.title: Bath
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 The Demolition Man S1 - "Bath"
programme.desc: In this episode an intensive operation takes place to bring down a beast of a building, Harworth Colliery.

programme.title: Workin' the Pile
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Wrecking Plan S1 - "Workin' the Pile"
programme.desc: As employees from Avi Art are picking up a specialty wing cut from the 727, Tony sees a rival company stealing supplies from the Demo Pad. The owner of ARC Aerospace - Janet - shows up unexpectedly to the Pad with potential investors from China.

programme.title: He Slurped It
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Wrecking Plan S1 - "He Slurped It"
programme.desc: A rare Lockheed L-1011 airplane makes its way on the Demo Pad and the Cut Up Crew preps it for destruction. It is Tony's birthday and the guys celebrate at the Pad with pranks, a Bobcat race, and an extra-large version of the arcade crane game.

programme.title: The Yorke
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Wrecking Plan S1 - "The Yorke"
programme.desc: A buyer orders two airplane cockpit yokes but the message doesn't get to Mike in time - the yokes get destroyed. The Cut Up Crew tears down the overhead bins and pulls out insulation in the L-1011.

programme.title: Palmdale's Finest
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Wrecking Plan S1 - "Palmdale's Finest"
programme.desc: The CUC works to replace the hydraulic ram arm on one of the excavators. A priority order for the landing gear off a Boeing 767 forces the guys to stop demolition on the L-1011. Sal opens up about his checkered past and his new outlook on life.

programme.title: End of the World Crossbow
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Backyard Ballistics S1 - "End of the World Crossbow"
programme.desc: Time for an apocalyptic challenge. Cheyenne has some awesome tests to put Jörg through his paces. He is being taken out of his comfort zone. No workshop, no power tools, no researched plan. Just Jörg, his knowledge and 3 tricky survival situations.

programme.title: Machine Gun Crossbow
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Backyard Ballistics S1 - "Machine Gun Crossbow"
programme.desc: Jörg & Cheyenne are challenged to create a Machine Gun Crossbow. They need to build a chassis, a magazine and an automatic firing and reloading mechanism. Can they build a fully automatic crossbow? And will it beat a team of crack crossbow shooters?

programme.title: Flaming Ballista
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Backyard Ballistics S1 - "Flaming Ballista"
programme.desc: Jörg & Cheyenne are challenged to build a Flaming Ballista. Jörg schools us about siege weaponry and they craft a plan on how they are going to build this machine! Cheyenne takes charge of the metalwork and Jörg takes charge of the rubber and wood.

programme.title: Scuba Spear
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Backyard Ballistics S1 - "Scuba Spear"
programme.desc: Jörg and Cheyenne are challenged to build a Scuba Spear Gun! Despite having no experience of underwater builds, Jörg has a few tricks up his sleeve. But will they be able to beat one of the world’s greatest spearfishermen in our popping finale!

programme.title: Cannon Carnage
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Backyard Ballistics: Fully Loaded S1 - "Cannon Carnage"
programme.desc: Jörg and Cheyenne are challenged to build a Rubber Powered Cannon! Cheyenne sets about building the wheels, framework, and crank for the cannon whilst Jörg sets about doing the science behind the rubber! Time to cause some serious carnage!

programme.title: Weapons of Fear
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 Combat Countdown S1 - "Weapons of Fear"
programme.desc: In battle, fear will break an army faster than any amount of firepower. The world's most intimidating war machines terrify the enemy because they're unstoppable, undetectable or with sheer destructive potential.

programme.title: Surgical Strikers
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 Combat Countdown S1 - "Surgical Strikers"
programme.desc: The ability to deploy precision strike weapons has completely changed the nature of war. Advances in weapon technology have made it possible to send a missile through a specific window of a building from a thousand miles away.

programme.title: Louisiana
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 The Demolition Man S1 - "Louisiana"
programme.desc: Explosive demolition of the O. K. Allen Bridge.

programme.title: Eat Like Confucius
programme.sub-title: S02 : E05 Foodwise S2 - "Eat Like Confucius"
programme.desc: "Foodwise" host Tianran He explores the ancient town of Qufu, the birthplace of Confucius.

programme.title: Xilingol
programme.desc: In Xilin Gol, the local cuisines here are so attractive to the tourists, such as the roasted lamb is a traditional local dish. And the fired stone fried lamb is so hard to find if you are not traveling to Inner Mongolia.Just join in this visual trip!

programme.title: Kunming
programme.desc: Join host Tianran He in Kunming, the capital of Yunnan province in southwest China. Named the Spring City for its perennially good weather, Kunming is one of China's most ethnically diverse cities, something that's reflected in its food.

programme.title: California Desert
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 My Van Life S1 - "California Desert"
programme.desc: Lisa connects with a nomad poet, who literally helps her ‘climb’ out of her funk by scaling a challenging peak. After taking tea with a magician, Lisa meets a paramedic single mother hoping to imbue her daughter with valuable life experiences.

programme.title: California Coast
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 My Van Life S1 - "California Coast"
programme.desc: After driving across the country, Lisa heads to Santa Monica to hang with a Hollywood producer and check out his pimped out Mercedes Benz G-Wagon. Lisa is welcomed into the school bus home of a family of 7! Because there is always room for one more.

programme.title: Eze (France) V Stockholm
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Jet Set S1 - "Eze (France) V Stockholm"
programme.desc: From the French Riviera, Richard attempts to win the episode from his hotel, where every house in the town is actually a hotel suite. Meanwhile Gill tours the Swedish capital of Stockholm, sailing around the archipelago.

programme.title: Barcelona V Lake Como
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Jet Set S1 - "Barcelona V Lake Como"
programme.desc: Both Richard and Gill battle it out with their list of whose who, responsible for putting their locations, Barcelona and Lake Como on the world map.

programme.title: The Ice Hotel V Barbados
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Jet Set S1 - "The Ice Hotel V Barbados"
programme.desc: In freezing temperatures Gill attempts a Jet Set Victory by sculpting her very own ice cat. Unfortunately it leaves Dave feeling rather scared. Richard attempts to heat up the competition from the Caribbean island of Barbados.

programme.title: Chiang Mai V Venice
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Jet Set S1 - "Chiang Mai V Venice"
programme.desc: Richard immerses himself in Thai culture, picking his own rice, learning to cook Thai style with a local top chef and paying a visit to a retired elephant park. While Gill heads to the Italian city of Venice, for a cheeky Bellini in Harry’s Bar.

programme.title: The Ultimate Test
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Order Up! S1 - "The Ultimate Test"
programme.desc: In his final days in Singapore, Hudson explores modern interpretations of traditional recipes, then creates a menu for the US Ambassador and learns from a Michelin-starred chef. His journey ends when he cooks for local celebrities, and own VIP guest.

programme.title: Back to Basics
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Order Up! S1 - "Back to Basics"
programme.desc: Hudson starts his culinary journey in LA, learning from chef Kim Vu and celebrity chef Martin Yan. He covers the basics in the kitchen, sharpens his culinary skills, and creates an artistic dish for Randall Park and his ‘Fresh off the Boat’ co-stars.

programme.title: How to Order Chinese Food
programme.sub-title: S02 : E04 Foodwise S2 - "How to Order Chinese Food"
programme.desc: In this episode, hosts Tianran and Eva will give you a crash course on everything from choosing the right restaurant, to pairing dishes according to color, aroma, taste and form, so that at the end, you too can feast your friends like a pro.

programme.title: Eat Like Confucius
programme.sub-title: S02 : E05 Foodwise S2 - "Eat Like Confucius"
programme.desc: "Foodwise" host Tianran He explores the ancient town of Qufu, the birthplace of Confucius.

programme.title: Xilingol
programme.desc: In Xilin Gol, the local cuisines here are so attractive to the tourists, such as the roasted lamb is a traditional local dish. And the fired stone fried lamb is so hard to find if you are not traveling to Inner Mongolia.Just join in this visual trip!

programme.title: Fiambala
programme.desc: In this episode, Rob and Dave drive through Fiambala and decide to stop at the town’s most famous site the naturally occurring hot springs baths.

programme.title: Crater
programme.desc: Rob and Dave continue their journey to Salta, but before they go anywhere near the glorious wine capital they make a detour the Cerro Blanco, a large volcano.

programme.title: Stunning Scenario
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Roads End S1 - "Stunning Scenario"
programme.desc: A day of gruelling grape picking lies ahead and the duo discover a new love for the country’s greatest export.

programme.title: Back to where it all started
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Roads End S1 - "Back to where it all started"
programme.desc: In this episode Rob and Dave are reaching the end of their incredible journey and must go back to where it all started Buenos Aires.

programme.title: 6000 km
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 Roads End S1 - "6000 km"
programme.desc: In this episode Rob and Dave make a toast to their recently finished trip rough riding across Argentina.

programme.title: Re-live
programme.desc: In this episode Rob and Dave re-live some more of the highlights from their incredible 6000km journey.

programme.title: The Gift of Inspiration
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Kindness Diaries S1 - "The Gift of Inspiration"
programme.desc: Leon finds refuge in the world’s toughest city, works his way across the Atlantic aboard a cargo ship. A Spanish customs issue threatens to derail his journey, and the music of two African musicians in southern France, inspires his next gift.

programme.title: The Gift of Transformation
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Kindness Diaries S1 - "The Gift of Transformation"
programme.desc: After striking out in St. Tropez, and getting lost in the Italian countryside, Leon finds shelter in 18th Century villa outside Torino, but his luck runs out on the shores of Lake Como.

programme.title: The Gift of Abundance
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Kindness Diaries S1 - "The Gift of Abundance"
programme.desc: After catching some waves in Zagreb and touring the turbulent history of Sarajevo, Leon and Kindness One® make it to Montenegro, where a kind farmer whose family has been tilling the same land for 20 generations inspires his next surprise gift.

programme.title: The Gift of Service
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Kindness Diaries S1 - "The Gift of Service"
programme.desc: In Kosovo, Leon meets a Muslim woman who dreams of peace, and some bike trouble in Greece opens the door for adventure. Finally, some high-altitude hospitality in Turkey inspires his next surprise gift.

programme.title: Newport, RI
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Road Trip Masters S1 - "Newport, RI"
programme.desc: Nick and Brian travel to Newport, RI and experience everything from fresh lobster to the Gilded Age. Then set sail on a classic America's Cup 12 meter yacht.

programme.title: Cape May, NJ
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Road Trip Masters S1 - "Cape May, NJ"
programme.desc: Brian and Nick road trip to Cape May, NJ and discover a town that is preserved in the Victorian Era. Join them as they feast on fresh caught seafood, search for diamonds, and blast off on a jet boat!

programme.title: Gettysburg, PA
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Road Trip Masters S1 - "Gettysburg, PA"
programme.desc: Brian and Nick travel to Gettysburg, PA and experience the battlefield from behind enemy lines. They step back in time and explore the many places that make this town a must stop in Pennsylvania.

programme.title: Lake Placid. NY
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Road Trip Masters S1 - "Lake Placid. NY"
programme.desc: The home of the Miracle On Ice...Brian and Nick hit Lake Placid and participate in some of the Olympic events. They even have time for the outdoors and partake in some local brews and food.

programme.title: How to Order Chinese Food
programme.sub-title: S02 : E04 Foodwise S2 - "How to Order Chinese Food"
programme.desc: In this episode, hosts Tianran and Eva will give you a crash course on everything from choosing the right restaurant, to pairing dishes according to color, aroma, taste and form, so that at the end, you too can feast your friends like a pro.

programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Man Eats Wild S1 - "Deadly Outback"
programme.desc: We are in the outback of Australia. It’s the Monsoon season. Mario links up with longtime friend in search of a wild Buffalo, he attempts to cook an amazing South American inspired dish in the middle of nowhere.

programme.title: Up with the Gods
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Man Eats Wild S1 - "Up with the Gods"
programme.desc: Mario teams up with good friend and precision rifle expert Bernard and heads into the high alpine mountains above New Zealand’s rugged West Coast in search of tahr. Drawing on his Greek roots, Mario cooks a rustic “Kleftiko” dish in an earth oven.

programme.title: Outback Odyssey
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Man Eats Wild S1 - "Outback Odyssey"
programme.desc: Mario Kalpou travels to the outback desert of Australia in search of feral camels that have been running rampant. With a bow in hand and scorching heat he explores the Great Dividing Range, hoping to harvest one of these middle eastern based beasts.

programme.title: Volcanic Kingfish
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Man Eats Wild S1 - "Volcanic Kingfish"
programme.desc: Mario hooks up with old friend and current world record holder for kingfish Rick Pollock. They fish the coast of New Zealand just off a live Volcano, then tragedy strikes. After the Volcano erupts Mario prepares an amazing ceviche dish.

programme.title: HairStyle, The Talent Show
programme.desc: The first challenge is to style in the most important and critical setting: bridal. The brides know exactly what they want when they enter the salon. They will choose their stylist, who will talk with them to work on the vision. In a challenge like this, failure is not an option. TV personality and fashion influencer Paige DeSorbo will visit the salon and share some of her go-to haircare tips. Next, the contestants will work on haircare, restoring the salon's clients’ damaged hair. TV personality and fashion influencer Paige DeSorbo will share some of her go-to haircare tips. They will start with a diagnosis in the salon to determine the cause of the damage and reparation.

programme.title: HairStyle, The Talent Show
programme.desc: In this fourth episode of the season, two contestants will say goodbye to HairStyle. The contestants will take on a new adventure, working on curly and textured hair. Each visitor to the salon knows exactly what style they want done, and the contestants must replicate the picture shown to them as accurately as possible. The editor-in-chief of Allure magazine, Jessica Cruel, will drop into the salon to share her personal method for caring for curls. The second challenge is all about creativity: the contestants must design a style that could feature on the cover of a top-tier magazine.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay's gruelling chef challenge reaches its penultimate episode. Following a double elimination, the remaining chefs are challenged to create a unique dining experience for a large group of well-known chefs, including guest judges Bruce Kalman, Steve Samson, Mette Williams and Alessio Biagini. The winner is taken on a helicopter tour of Los Angeles and treated to lunch with Gordon.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.sub-title: S16 : E16 Leaving It on the Line
programme.desc: Grand finale of Gordon Ramsay's gruelling chef challenge. The final two chefs work on their menus for the last dinner service before being treated to makeovers and getting a surprise from actor Rob Morrow. Celebrity guests CJ Wilson, Andrea Roth, Danny Trejo and Naomi Grossman attend the final dinner service, but which chef will walk away victorious?

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: It's time for a brand new season of Hell's Kitchen USA. Chef Ramsay is bringing back former black jacket chefs to compete in an all-star season for the biggest prize in Hell's Kitchen history.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.sub-title: S03 : E04 Checkers and Valleys Drive-In Restaurants
programme.desc: Rick Silva has been CEO of Checkers & Rallys fast food restaurants for 5 years and has focused strongly on growth. He wants to steal market share from his competitors, so he is going undercover to find more ways to drive sales. While undercover, he finds one restaurant that is doing everything wrong from food preparation to management and training, and he's forced to close the store. He fears the entire Checkers & Rally’s system may be broken. Crew members and managers feel like they are not paid fairly and their ideas are ignored. Rick needs to focus less on sales and more on providing proper training, incentives, and tools to his employees.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Bernt Bodal is the CEO of American Seafoods, one of the largest seafood companies in the United States. A Norwegian immigrant, Bernt moved to the United States in 1978 and worked as a deck hand for 13 years on vessels in Alaska. He prides himself not as

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Louisiana Kitchen is a restaurant chain that generates more than $2 billion per year. Lynne Zappone, the Chief Talent Officer, has only been with Popeye’s a few months but is being sent undercover instead of the

programme.title: Sun, Sea & Love Cheats
programme.desc: 59-year-old Diane's passion for African music took her to The Gambia where she met drum master Mobe. Won over by Mobe's talent and charisma, Diane fell in love and married him. She paid for the visa to allow him to stay in the UK, as well as supporting him financially. But three years into their marriage, Diane discovered Mobe was in contact with other women and found a note in his bag detailing how he could divorce her and legally remain in the UK.

programme.title: Ramsay’s Kitchen Nightmares
programme.desc: Gordon is tackling a brand new start up restaurant, La Granada Divino in Gaucin, a mountain village near the Costa del Sol. Owned by Milan and Gina, who've never run a restaurant but sank their savings and retirement fund into the place. The chef was recruited solely on the basis of his pâté, which they tasted at a fair, and that he had been head chef of Scott’s and Harvey Nichols in London. Gordon is shocked to find a confused and dated menu and when he carries out background checks it becomes apparent why chef Neil is struggling. The restaurant has only been open for 8 weeks, but the money is all gone and they're heading for disaster.

programme.title: Scandal Made Me Famous and Murder Made Me Famous (Revised)
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Green River Killer: I Met My Sister’s Murderer
programme.desc: Gary Ridgway began murdering prostitutes and children throughout the 1980s and 1990s strangling his victims and discarding their bodies around Seattle and the Washington Green River, earning him the moniker, the “Green River Killer.” It wasn't until 2001, that the nefarious sociopath was connected by DNA evidence to the murders of four women. Debra Estes was one of the youngest victims of serial killer Gary Ridgway, who amassed a total of 49 confirmed murders (he confessed to 71). Years later Estes' sister Jenny Graham would meet with Ridgway in prison seeking answers trying to find a sense of peace and healing.

programme.title: Scandal Made Me Famous and Murder Made Me Famous (Revised)
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 The Dating Game Killer: The Lost Victims
programme.desc: Rodney Alcala was a contestant who earned a date on the TV show The Dating Game in 1978, despite being a convicted rapist, registered sex offender and under investigation for multiple murders. Thankfully, his date sensed something was off about the overly sly and dominant Alcala, and she passed on the date. With estimates that run as high as 130 victims, Alcala had a ruthless spree of murder, rape and sexual assault in the 1970s. Posing as a photographer, he would lure young women by asking them to model before brutally killing them. During the investigation, authorities in Seattle discovered a rented storage locker with more than 900 photographs taken by Alcala.

programme.title: Scandal Made Me Famous and Murder Made Me Famous (Revised)
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Susan Smith: Sex Behind Bars
programme.desc: In 1995, Susan Smith was sentenced to life in prison for the drowning murders of her two children, 3-year-old Michael and 14-month-old Alexander. The unthinkable revelations about the crime, along with the added ugliness of Smith initially blaming the boys’ kidnapping on an imaginary Black man, made her reviled by the public and the media. Prosecutors believed the reason she killed her sons is because she was in love with a man who didn’t want children. Astonishingly, more than a quarter of a century later, sex and love are still clouding Smith’s judgement. Two prison guards have since been convicted of having sex with her behind bars.

programme.title: Born Naughty?
programme.desc: The doctors meet eight-year-old Bobby, who won’t eat anything except chocolate, sweets, cakes, chips, cheese, yoghurt and baked beans. Has Bobby got a food phobia and what can his parents do to help him try new healthy foods?

programme.title: The Posh Frock Shop
programme.desc: Engaged couple Didi and Charlotte enter the boutique both looking for their perfect wedding gown. But before they can leave, they are faced with a big decision. Socialite Delilah turns to Ian with a very unusual request and Jens is in a race against the clock with a big hotel commission.

programme.title: The Posh Frock Shop
programme.desc: Jens takes Ian out of his comfort zone with a visit to the flower market. After several frosty receptions at other bridal boutiques, bride-to-be Kelly is hoping that Ian Stuart Bride will save the day. Ian gets a visit from an old friend, who doesn’t pull her punches.

programme.title: The Posh Frock Shop
programme.desc: West End star Zoe is looking for a wedding dress with the wow factor whilst Jens creates even more star appeal with a special creation. Ian has an unusual request from Belinda who is looking for an evening dress that will match the colour of her beloved parrot.

programme.title: The Posh Frock Shop
programme.desc: The heat is on for Ian and the team as they host a fashion buyers’ show. Will Ian’s latest showcase descend into catwalk chaos? Craig gets caught in a mother and daughter crossfire, as bride-to-be Akilah visits the boutique with her mother and a very large entourage.

programme.title: The Posh Frock Shop
programme.desc: It’s the moment of truth for Fatma, a bridal boutique owner and long-time friend of Ian who is picking up her bespoke mother-of-the groom dress. Having lost weight, bride-to-be Rachel is looking to Carrelyn to find the perfect dress to show off her new shape. And Ian faces his fears in front of a crowd.

programme.title: The Ex-Files
programme.desc: Sarah struggles with conflict, instead she runs away from her problems leaving them unresolved. This is a learnt behavior that stems from her parent’s divorce running from one parent to another and playing them against each other. This is quite common in kids from broken families, it is used as a source of power and a way of getting what they want. In Sarah’s case this behavior has led her into a messy love triangle.

programme.title: The Ex-Files
programme.desc: Carly has recently undergone a huge physical transformation but her self-esteem is yet to catch up, she constantly compares herself to other women. This is becoming more and more common everyday, women and men comparing themselves to everyday people on carefully curated social media accounts and subsequently doubting themselves. Carly needs to really see her beauty, believe it and stop comparing herself to other people.

programme.title: The Ex-Files
programme.desc: Since falling pregnant at the young age of 21, Amber has formed an extremely close bond with her mother. Becoming a mother is one of the most physical and psychological changes a woman will ever experience – new mothers often struggle with losing their identity and independence, it’s called the silent wall – the process of slowly fading away from themselves and their interests. In Amber’s case, becoming a mother so young made it even more difficult, as she was still yet to discover who she was as an adult. Amber’s lack of independence it seems is now affecting her relationships, it’s time for her to regain her identity.

programme.title: The Ex-Files
programme.desc: Lyndal has unrealistic expectations of what a relationship should look and feel like. With the onslaught of dating apps, millennials have become addicted to that early feeling of excitement in the early stages of a relationship, and they are less likely to put in the hard work that comes after. Lyndal needs to reframe what a relationship looks like and be brave enough to go after what she wants.

programme.title: I Do... Let's Eat!
programme.sub-title: S03 : E06 Christine Valles and Jonathan Tsui
programme.desc: When guests first arrive, they will be served hors d’oeuvres that include sushi rolls, crab cakes, coconut shrimp, and mushroom bruschetta. The first plated course is a miso-marinated Jumbo shrimp with arugula salad. Then a wasabi and Chinese wine risotto, with shitake mushrooms and assorted cheese. The meat course is pork tenderloin stuffed with mangos, and served with chow mein noodles and Chinese broccoli. Lastly, a plated dessert, the tiramisu wedding cake. Then after 11 pm, there will be a late night buffet table, featuring specialty sandwiches, and an assortment of pastries.

programme.title: I Do... Let's Eat!
programme.sub-title: S03 : E07 Nicole Charles and Daniel Page
programme.desc: After a church ceremony, Nicole and Daniel have chosen to have their reception at Fuzion Banquets, in Mississauga, a suburb west of Toronto. Manager Minesh Dattani says, “we have clients from every background imaginable. We assign the chefs necessary according to the cuisine.” And lucky for Nicole, head chef Owen Mitchell is Jamaican. Chef Owen says “I’m trained in all cuisines...but West Indian food is in my blood!”

programme.title: I Do... Let's Eat!
programme.sub-title: S03 : E08 Dawn Stefanec and Cary Fillion
programme.desc: The “babas”, Ukrainian for “grandma”, are the cooks that keep the Ukrainian traditions alive. In the prairie Ukrainian tradition, wedding banquets are held in church halls – halls that are used also for community events and the odd Bingo night. The babas volunteer their time and expertise, cooking all the food for weddings and other large functions, to help raise money for the church. Dawn says “the babas make the best perogies and cabbage rolls – just like home.”

programme.title: I Do... Let's Eat!
programme.sub-title: S03 : E09 Maureen Kelly and Shawn Matyczuk
programme.desc: In charge of the wedding menu is The Juniper’s Executive chef Tim Matsell. He’s originally from Ontario, but says the Banff area is now his home for good. “Why would I leave paradise? he asks. But even in paradise, Chef Tim has high expectations to meet. Between the groom’s own culinary background, and the guests’ unfamiliarity with Rocky Mountain cuisine, Chef Tim has his work cut out for him.

programme.title: Britain's Horror Homes
programme.desc: Bracknell, parents Lucy and Ben face a battle against mould and insects, while South Wales newlyweds Richie and Siobhan return from honeymoon to find their home ruined by a flood. Meanwhile, a family house in Durham is victim to a lightning storm, and brother and sister Richard and Imogen are spooked after moving into their Ascot apartment when a series of strange coincidences occur.

programme.title: Britain's Horror Homes
programme.desc: Disaster strikes in Woodford Green, London as a house partially collapses due to dodgy building work being done next door. In Much Hoole near Preston, a loft extension becomes a nightmare when the builder goes missing, and in Penpedairheol, South Wales, an act of nature nearly costs lives.

programme.title: Hoarder SOS
programme.desc: A woman in Lincolnshire sends out an SOS to clear the clutter taking over her home.

programme.title: Hoarder SOS
programme.desc: Marianne helps an HR consultant tackle a mountain of clothes, including her wedding dress.

programme.title: World's Weirdest Restaurants
programme.desc: World’s Weirdest Restaurants takes you to ‘Sammy’s Roumanian Steak House’, an authentic Jewish restaurant in New York where their every-day-is-a-bar-mitzvah attitude will make you say “mazel tov!” Next, at Tokyo’s ‘Namahage’ a visit from the Japanese boogeymen will have you on your best behaviour. We visit Ferrara, Italy where diners dressed in white take to the streets like a flash mob for ‘Street Dinner’, carrying tables and chairs to a secret rendezvous point where you’ll dine al fresco on a surprise gourmet meal. And later, at the 5,000 seat ‘Royal Dragon’ in Thailand, the flying servers will rush your hot pot to your table—on a zip line!

programme.title: World's Weirdest Restaurants
programme.sub-title: S02 : E05 The Art Of Dinner
programme.desc: World’s Weirdest Restaurants takes you to Ukraine’s ‘Salo Museum’, where they turn pig fat into an art—and your dinner. Then we stop in Riverside, California at ‘Tio’s Tacos’—an authentic Mexican restaurant where yesterday’s trash is today’s over-the-top décor—where we’ll witness a wedding in a chapel made of pop bottles. Next we head to Bangkok’s ‘Le Pla Daak’ restaurant where they serve up Northern Thai cuisine and spin classic rock ‘n’ roll from their very own radio station. Then we visit Tennessee’s ‘Lumberjack Feud’ for competitive log rolling, axe-throwing and tree climbing, and some down-home cooking that’s fit for a clan of hungry lumberjacks.

programme.title: World's Weirdest Restaurants
programme.sub-title: S02 : E06 Pie In The Sky
programme.desc: World’s Weirdest Restaurants lifts you off to ‘Dinner in the Sky’, where you’ll dine on a gourmet meal while dangling over Munich. Then we’re off to ‘Kryjivka’ in Lviv, Ukraine where if you’ve ever hungered to hunker in a bunker then this underground, military themed restaurant will have you signing up on the spot. At Tokyo’s ghost-themed ‘Yurei Izakaya’, funeral rituals and a game of wasabi roulette are all part of the fun. And lastly, we head back in time to ‘Medieval Times’ in Buena Park, California where swords clash and maces smash, as you cheer on your favourite knight while enjoying an authentic banquet.

programme.title: World's Most Extraordinary Families
programme.desc: In this episode, we meet the amazing family who refuse to let a rare bone condition stop them enjoying lives to the full. Plus, we follow a family from Las Vegas with an incredible claim to fame – they think they are the strongest family in America! Finally, we catch up with a New York family who are preparing for the end of the world!

programme.title: World's Most Extraordinary Families
programme.desc: In this episode we meet The Bartling family, kind hearted couple Joe and Karen Bartling have adopted six children from around the world who are all blind. We meet the Williams family, brothers Andrew and Peter Williams, began their own family business selling marijuana in Colorado, they now employ eight family members and turnover forty million dollars a year. Finally, we meet the Mayes family who gave up their expensive lifestyle to live and travel on a converted school bus.

programme.title: HairStyle, The Talent Show
programme.desc: Not every client is hard to please, but for contestants' safety, it's imperative the clients of the salon leave happy. They will listen to their models and find out what they want, in order to carry out their wishes as closely as possible. Actress, model and TV personality Christine Quinn will visit the salon to share her haircare tips with the contestants. In the second challenge, contestants will work with models on hair colouring. Each look can highlight the model's natural beauty, while properly nourishing their hair, as colour can be damaging.

programme.title: HairStyle, The Talent Show
programme.desc: The four finalists on ‘HairStyle’ have proven that they have the talent and skill to become great hairstylists. But there can only be one winner. To be that winner, the finalists must undertake their two challenges. The first one is to cut their model’s hair using the Rossano Ferretti’s Method, judged by the man himself. To win, they must design a sensational look for the Met Gala. Rossano Ferretti will give a live demonstration of his revolutionary technique, for the first time on TV. The special guest of the grand finale is singer and beauty influencer Pia Mia.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The all-star chefs compete against each other in a bar menu challenge with a valuable prize: immunity from elimination. Out of four top dishes, Chef Ramsay declares Milly's outstanding seafood poutine victorious. Dinner service on opening night proves difficult for the red team who can't quite get their proteins in order, while the blue team struggles with an ailing team member. When the red team burns their last chance for redemption, they are kicked out of the kitchen completely; leaving Chef Ramsay to make a shocking decision at elimination.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: With 15 chefs remaining, the red and blue teams must race against each other to build a gourmet seafood tower and later, go head-to-head in a heated dinner service with tableside appetizers.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: After Ashley goes home, the chefs compete in a Letter Lottery challenge. Giovanni's dish isn't enough to beat the red team, and the women get to enjoy a beautiful day in Santa Barbara. At dinner service, Josh has a portion control problem on risotto, Giovanni sends up raw pork, and Benjamin serves a raw wellington; Chef Ramsay has had enough and kicks the blue team out of the kitchen. The blue team puts Giovanni and Josh up for elimination, but Chef Ramsay shocks everyone when he moves Josh to the red team, and Robyn to the blue team.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: CEO to go out and meet with the people that her job is directly related to. When Hurricane Katrina hit New Orleans, Popeye’s took on the responsibility to help their employees rebuild from the tragedy. In her position as Chief Talent Officer it is crucial for Lynne to know how the employees feel about their work environment and that they are happy with how the company is run and also that the company feels they matter.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: For two years Harlan Kent has been the CEO of the worlds largest candle manufacturer, Yankee Candle, and he's worked there for ten years. When he first got an interview at Yankee Candle, his father thought that working for a candle company was a terrible idea, but Harlan has helped build the company to a $730,000,000 per year enterprise and is going undercover to find out how he can help grow the company to a billion dollar business. Harlan is a perfectionist, stays awake nights worrying about the company's retail business and wants everything just right. He will learn that he has employees in the company who care as much and work just as hard.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Mark King has been with the the world’s top golf equipment brand, Taylor Made, for 30 years. He's worked his way up from sales to CEO and believes that he is very much in touch with the people who work for him since he himself started from the bottom. In recent years sales throughout the golf industry have declined, and Mark hopes that going undercover will give him the opportunity to see where he can make improvements to the company and bring revenues back up. Mark will come to realize that making golf more accessible to people that could not traditionally afford to play is the key to opening up the sport to a larger population.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E37 Yugi vs. Pegasus Match of the Millennium, Part 3
programme.desc: Yugi has found a counter to Pegasus’s mind-reading ability: Yugi switches back and forth between his two souls! Yugi is able to destroy Pegasus’s Toon World, but the duel has just only begun. The next level of the deadly Shadow Game is about to start!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E38 Yugi vs. Pegasus Match of the Millennium, Part 4
programme.desc: Yugi crumples in exhaustion under the crippling power of the Shadow Game. His friends yell desperate encouragement, but their voices cannot penetrate the sphere of darkness. Yugi’s chance at victory is slipping away, as is his life!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E39 Yugi vs. Pegasus Match of the Millennium, Part 5
programme.desc: Pegasus summons Relinquished, a fearsome monster that can consume Yugi’s Duel Monsters! Yugi counters with… Kuriboh? The smallest, weakest creature in the game? Has Yugi given up, or does he have one last strategy to snatch victory from the jaws of defeat? The Shadow Game comes to a close!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The Pegasus Saga comes to an end, but a new journey is about to begin! Yugi meets a mysterious Egyptian named Shadi who enters Yugi’s mind with the Millennium Key. What are these Millennium Items, and do they hold the answer to the mystery behind the Shadow Games?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E41 The Wrath of Rebecca
programme.desc: Yugi and friends return from the Duelist Kingdom only to meet a young girl named Rebecca who demands that Grandpa return Blue-Eyes White Dragon to her! She’s here to claim back the card that Grandpa stole from her grandfather many years ago!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Rebecca mistakenly believes that Grandpa stole Blue-Eyes White Dragon from her grandfather. Yugi must defend Blue-Eyes White Dragon to teach her that it’s not the power of the cards, but the heart that’s in them that counts.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The two-faced Board of Directors of KaibaCorp trap Kaiba inside a virtual reality game! Mokuba recruits Yugi and Joey to free Kaiba from this ultimate game where losing equals death!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The quest for Kaiba continues with a little help from… Mai? But can Yugi and friends adapt to a virtual world where the rules and strategies keep changing every step of the way?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and friends rescue Kaiba, but they are still stuck in the game! The only exit is past Five-Headed Dragon, but in the difficult duel, Joey, Mokuba, and Mai lose all their life points! Can Yugi and Kaiba, two former opponents, work together and face the biggest enemy of their lives?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E46 Dungeon Dice Monsters, Part 1
programme.desc: A new student, Duke Devlin, defeats Joey in a game of Duel Monsters, forcing Joey to become his servant. Duke forces Joey to wear a dog costume and humiliates him in public, forcing Yugi to challenge Duke to a duel. However, this will not be a Duel Monsters duel, but a new game named Dungeon Dice Monsters!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E47 Dungeon Dice Monsters, Part 2
programme.desc: In exchange for Joey’s freedom, Yugi agrees to give up Duel Monsters forever if he loses. Unfamiliar with the rules, Yugi gets off to a rough start. His chances do not improve as Duke reveals that he designed Dungeon Dice Monsters with Pegasus’s aid! Can Yugi learn the new complex rules, much less form a strategy, before he is soundly defeated?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E48 Dungeon Dice Monsters, Part 3
programme.desc: Yugi uses his innate gaming skills to turn the tables on Duke, but Duke has one more rule to mention: All creatures take up territory on the grid-like board. With no room to summon any new monsters, Yugi’s position is helpless!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E49 Dungeon Dice Monsters, Part 4
programme.desc: After Duke’s all-powerful Orgoth the Relentless dices Yugi’s entire cadre of monsters into shreds, Yugi only has one turn left before he loses all his heart points! Yugi’s last hope rests in one final dice roll in the thrilling conclusion to Dungeon Dice Monsters!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 The Heart of the Cards
programme.desc: When the #1 ranked duelist and ruthless tycoon, Seto Kaiba, kidnaps Yugi’s Grandpa to get the rare Blue-Eyes White Dragon card, Yugi must face Kaiba in the ultimate Duel Monsters showdown!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 The Gauntlet Is Thrown
programme.desc: Yugi is forced to face Duel Monsters creator, Maximillion Pegasus, in the mysterious Shadow Realm where all the monsters and magic are real. If Yugi loses, Pegasus claims Grandpa’s soul as his prize!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Journey to the Duelist Kingdom
programme.desc: Yugi gives up one of his own Star Chips so Joey can board the boat bound for Duelist Kingdom and duel to save his sister’s eyesight. Meanwhile, the cheat Weevil tries to cripple Yugi’s deck by tossing his best cards overboard!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Into The Hornet's Nest
programme.desc: Pegasus announces that there are many strange secrets that will make his ultimate tournament unlike any they’ve ever had. Yugi must not only figure the rules out, but master them if he’s to survive!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 The Ultimate Great Moth
programme.desc: After Yugi defeats Weevil’s first wave of Duel Monsters, Weevil has one last trick up his sleeve; a ravenous Great Moth that grows in power every turn! Can Yugi find a way to destroy this winged beast before it destroys him?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey finds himself courageously accepting a challenge from veteran duelist, Mai. But when Mai begins to demonstrate an unnerving psychic ability, Joey has to figure out Mai’s secret strategy before falling victim to it!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Attack from the Deep
programme.desc: The fisherman duelist baits Yugi into a duel on his own sea playing field for a home-field advantage. Can Yugi adapt to these new settings to turn the tide of battle?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: If Yugi is eliminated from the tournament, KaibaCorp’s crooked Board of Directors will transfer control of the company from Kaiba to Pegasus! Kaiba’s brother Mokuba challenges Yugi to a duel to protect his brother’s company!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Duel With a Ghoul
programme.desc: Yugi must duel a magical doppelganger of Kaiba. But with his best cards resting at the bottom of the ocean, Yugi must discover a new strategy to survive fake Kaiba’s powerful Blue-Eyes White Dragon!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Give up the Ghost
programme.desc: Yugi defeats Blue-Eyes White Dragon, but there are two more waiting in the wings! Will the real Kaiba reach Yugi in time to help beat this impersonator?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey decides to battle Rex Raptor without his friends’ help to prove that he is man enough to take care of Serenity on his own. But as Rex Raptor’s relentless dinos destroys Joey’s best Duel Monsters, will Tristan’s card remind him that with his friends, he is never alone in battle?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey duels valiantly, but Rex Raptor has unleashed his secret weapon: Red-Eyes B. Dragon! Joey must figure out the secret of Yugi’s gift, the Time Wizard card, without Yugi’s help or he’s taking the next boat out of Duelist Kingdom!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E13 Evil Spirit of the Ring
programme.desc: Yugi’s classmate Bakura, possessed by his Millennium Ring’s dark powers, traps Yugi and friends in a Shadow Game where they become the cards themselves! Not only must Yugi battle to avoid becoming a permanent part of the card game, but also free Bakura’s soul from the Millennium Ring’s control!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E14 The Light at the End of the Tunnel
programme.desc: Pegasus’s hired duelist PaniK cheats Mai of all her Star Chips, and Yugi vows to defeat him and win them back. But when PaniK’s Castle of Dark Illusions enshrouds his monsters in a black mist, how can Yugi defeat an enemy he cannot see?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: What starts out as a typical day at Domino High School turns out to be anything but typical.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Realizing that they’ve become part of a real-life version of the Capsule Monsters board game, the gang struggles to find a way out.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Reunited at last, Yugi and his friends rejoice.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Grandpa translates an ancient stone tablet which directs the gang to locate the “Fortress of Fear.”

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.sub-title: S05 : E19 Eye of the Storm
programme.desc: Yugi and his friends discover that in order to return home to the real world they must pass a series of tests known as the Five Sacred Trials.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.sub-title: S05 : E20 Trial of Light and Shadow
programme.desc: After narrowly escaping their battle in the desert, the gang finds themselves stranded on a mysterious floating island.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It’s on to level three as Yugi and his friends are transported to a lava-covered wasteland.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and his friends are faced with an impossible task – locating a magical apple in a forest full of apple trees.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.sub-title: S05 : E23 The Fiendish Five, Part 1
programme.desc: The gang stumbles upon a small kingdom dominated by a clan of fierce dragons known as The Fiendish Five.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.sub-title: S05 : E24 The Fiendish Five, Part 2
programme.desc: Yugi and his friends defeat the Fiendish Five…or so they think! These ferocious dragons have merged together and are now more powerful than ever!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.sub-title: S05 : E25 The True King, Part 1
programme.desc: Although the gang has passed the five sacred trials, the most dangerous test is yet to come.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.sub-title: S05 : E26 The True King, Part 2
programme.desc: Yugi’s friends are unconscious, leaving him to defeat Alexander the Great on his own!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.sub-title: S05 : E27 Tomb of the Nameless Pharaoh
programme.desc: Grandpa found the Millennium Puzzle decades ago, but little is known about the terrors, traps, turmoil and treachery he faced to find the artifact!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The evil spirit within the Millennium Ring has reunited with Bakura, yearning and prepped with a new monster to create the ultimate Shadow Game!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.sub-title: S05 : E29 Memoirs of a Pharaoh
programme.desc: Yugi and friends are going to the dawn of the duel, to the land where it all began, to the land where the Pharaoh’s mysteries lie: Egypt!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The fearless bandit king Bakura has invaded the Pharaoh’s palace to take down the keepers of the seven Millennium Items single-handedly!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Even with the potent power of Obelisk the Tormentor, the Pharaoh couldn’t prevent the bandit Bakura from escaping!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.sub-title: S05 : E32 Makings of a Magician
programme.desc: Mahad vows to stop the bandit king Bakura’s sneak attacks once and for all, but he may have made a promise he can’t keep!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.sub-title: S05 : E33 Birth of the Blue-Eyes
programme.desc: Mahad, the first of the Pharaoh’s guardians, has fallen!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.sub-title: S05 : E34 Village of Lost Souls
programme.desc: The origins of the Millennium Items are revealed! Who forged these powerful artifacts, and why were they created?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.sub-title: S05 : E35 A Reversal of Fortune
programme.desc: The Pharaoh calls forth the mighty Egyptian God Slifer the Sky Dragon to fight the bandit Bakura’s Diabound.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.sub-title: S05 : E36 In Search of a King
programme.desc: The bandit Bakura has stolen the Millennium Puzzle and sent the Pharaoh plummeting into the abyss.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.sub-title: S05 : E37 Village of Vengeance, Part 1
programme.desc: Yugi and the Pharaoh are reunited, but the Pharaoh is powerless without the Millennium Puzzle!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.sub-title: S05 : E38 Village of Vengeance, Part 2
programme.desc: It’s the showdown in the sands between the bandit Bakura and his ever-growing Diabound versus the Pharaoh.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.sub-title: S05 : E39 Village of Vengeance, Part 3
programme.desc: With the help of his father’s spirit, the Pharaoh and his guardians defeated Bakura’s Diabound and stopped Zorc from resurrecting... or did they?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.sub-title: S05 : E40 Village of Vengeance, Part 4
programme.desc: The secret is out! The Pharaoh’s journey was more than a trip to the past – it’s the greatest Shadow Game ever created!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.sub-title: S05 : E41 Village of Vengeance, Part 5
programme.desc: Zorc’s incredible shadow energies have resurrected the bandit Bakura and his Diabound!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.sub-title: S05 : E42 Name of the Game
programme.desc: Karim is the next to fall under the bandit Bakura’s assault, and the ravaging robber won’t stop until he conquers the rest!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.sub-title: S05 : E43 The Dark One Cometh, Part 1
programme.desc: After a nearly eternal slumber, the all-powerful Zorc has resurrected, plunging the world into darkness!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.sub-title: S05 : E44 The Dark One Cometh, Part 2
programme.desc: The Pharaoh and his guardians are down to their last line of defense as Shada falls victim to Zorc!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.sub-title: S05 : E45 The Dark One Cometh, Part 3
programme.desc: Even Exodia the Forbidden One was unable to defeat Zorc!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.sub-title: S05 : E46 The Dark One Cometh, Part 4
programme.desc: The three Egyptian Gods have been defeated!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.sub-title: S05 : E47 In the Name of the Pharaoh
programme.desc: The Pharaoh and Kaiba’s combined strength couldn’t defeat Zorc!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Pharaoh Atem, Yugi and friends have defeated the bandit Bakura and Zorc, but the final test still awaits! Yugi must duel... Atem!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.sub-title: S05 : E49 The Final Duel, Part 1
programme.desc: The time of destiny is now! Yugi vs. Atem!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.sub-title: S05 : E50 The Final Duel, Part 2
programme.desc: Atem has summoned all three Egyptian Gods!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.sub-title: S05 : E51 The Final Duel, Part 3
programme.desc: Not only does Atem still have all three Egyptian God Cards, Yugi doesn’t have a single monster on the field!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.sub-title: S05 : E52 The Final Duel, Part 4
programme.desc: Yugi and Atem – more than friends, closer than brothers.

programme.desc: This episode features chases in California and Georgia, an armed robbery at a convenience store and the longest prison riot in modern history.

programme.title: Small Town Big Deal

programme.desc: Jann and Rodney take you to a school that teaches you art and skills from days gone by and the National Hollerin' Contest. Yep, it's loud and can you guess if it's Rodney or Jann that get 1st runner-up?

programme.title: Small Town Big Deal
programme.sub-title: S01 : E18 Small Town Big Deal
programme.desc: There is never a dull moment at North America's Premier Farm Show. Jann and Rodney take you on a wild, muddy ride in the latest, fastest John Deere Gator; we're talking 62 horsepower and a top speed of 53 MPH and 0-30 in three seconds!

programme.title: Small Town Big Deal
programme.sub-title: S01 : E19 Small Town Big Deal
programme.desc: Jann & Rodney discover a California town where there are horse trails instead of sidewalks and stalls instead of parking spots. And then, Rodney gets "arrested" for dunking and driving...doughnuts that is!

programme.title: Small Town Big Deal
programme.sub-title: S01 : E20 Small Town Big Deal
programme.desc: Travis Roy was playing in his first university hockey game; his excitement was overwhelming. But only 11 seconds into his time on the ice he became a quadriplegic. You'll meet one man whose fields of dreams are helping Travis fulfill a new goal.

programme.title: Small Town Big Deal
programme.sub-title: S01 : E21 Small Town Big Deal
programme.desc: Come along on the oldest and largest bike ride! Recreational cyclists from not just the U.S. but from many countries take this yearly journey across the entire state of Iowa.

programme.title: Small Town Big Deal
programme.sub-title: S01 : E22 Small Town Big Deal
programme.desc: Rodney and Jann take you to one of the longest-lasting communal societies in the world, the "Amana Colonies."

programme.title: Small Town Big Deal

programme.desc: In a modern world, a family dairy farm went "retro": milk in glass bottles again. Oh, and crazy, enticing flavors: root beer milk, coffee milk, mint milk, to name a few! Did we mention Cajun cheese curds too?

programme.title: Andromeda
