programme.title: The Escort
programme.desc: Sophisticated and sassy, this lively rom-com promises to give you a good time! LA journalist, Mitch is single, broke, and addicted to sex. While in search for a fresh story, he meets the gorgeous Natalie, a Stanford University educated escort. She agrees to let desperate Mitch shadow her for a magazine expos. But things get complicated when the unlikely pair catch feelings!

programme.title: Ravage
programme.desc: A raw revenge thriller starring Annabelle Dexter-Jones (Succession), Bruce Dern (Nebraska) and Robert Longstreet (Doctor Sleep). Harper, a young nature photographer on assignment captures a disturbing event of a man being brutally beaten in the woods. After reporting the incident to the local sheriff, she is soon captured by the culprits and taken to an abandoned farm in the woods to be tortured.

programme.title: 16 Blocks
programme.desc: From director of action blockbuster Lethal Weapon, Richard Donner. Personal demons put cop Jack (Bruce Willis - Die Hard) at rock bottom but he wasn't about to let a witness be murdered on his watch. When he's assigned to escort a petty criminal to testify before the grand jury, a violent turn of events means this down-and-out cop needs to pull it together as he is hunted across New York City.

programme.title: Forget Everything and Run
programme.desc: The Walking Dead meets The Revenant. When a virus ravages a mountain community the survivors must flee from the monsters it created into the barren wilderness. Scavenging, freezing and dying, one family will fight for their lives against marauders hellbent on revenge. As humanity clings to hope, their only chance for survival is forming an alliance with the monsters that came calling.

programme.title: Come to Daddy
programme.desc: Elijah Wood (The Lord of the Rings) stars in this critically acclaimed, genre-bending horror comedy thatll leave you shocked and in hysterics. After years of no contact, Norval (Wood) visits his estranged father (Stephen McHattie, Watchmen) and quickly discovers he has a shady past. Also starring Michael Smiley (Kill List) and Garfield Wilson (The Man in the High Castle).

programme.title: Redwood
programme.desc: Breakout film at Frightfest Festival and a must-watch for all horror fans! Josh and Beth visit a secluded national park for some quality time. Ignoring the advice of the Park Rangers, they venture off trail and come face to face with Redwood's legendary wildlife. A fresh spin to a well-worn mythology, creating an edge-of-your seat movie to shred your nerves and make you think twice about camping.

programme.title: The Joker
programme.desc: In this creepy and twisted thriller, a young detective is caught in a horrifically sadistic game of cat-and-mouse when he is kidnapped and tormented by a masked, sex-crazed, serial killer. With a deadly race against time, he only has one method to save himself and a young girl. Starring Ron Perlman (Hellboy) and Halston Sage (Bad Neighbours) this clever, nail-biting nightmare is not to be missed!

programme.title: All Dogs go to Heaven
programme.desc: A poignant, classic masterpiece animation from acclaimed filmmaker Don Bluth and featuring the voice of Burt Reynolds. A stunning family film about the canine criminal underworld as we follow furry outcast, Charlie, who comes back to earth from heaven and befriends a young orphan who can speak to animals. As their friendship blossoms Charlie learns that friendship is the most heavenly gift of all.

programme.title: Rise of the Fellowship
programme.desc: What if Lord of the Rings wasnt just a story? School outcasts Randall and his friends spend most of their time playing online games. After Randall is set up for a crime he didnt commit, things get really bad. When a Lord of the Rings gaming competition is announced they decide that they must compete to get their own back. Little do they know that the journey they face is fraught with peril!

programme.title: Shelter
programme.desc: A high-octane, edge-of-your-seat thriller, starring Neta Riskin and Golshifteh Farahani. Israeli Mossad agent, Naomi is sent to protect Mona, a beautiful Lebanese informant who is recovering from plastic surgery to conceal her identity. In a safe house in Hamburg, the women form an unexpected bond, and experience a complex labyrinth of mistrust, loyalty, deception and betrayal.

programme.title: A Call to Spy
programme.desc: Inspired by incredible true stories. At the beginning of WWII Churchill orders his new spy agency to recruit women as spies to build a resistance. SOEs spymistress Vera Atkins (Stana Katic), recruits Virginia Hall (Sarah Megan Thomas), an ambitious American with a wooden leg and Noor Inayat Khan (Radhika Apte), a Muslim pacifist, who leave an unmistakable legacy in their wake.

programme.title: Everyone Says I Love You
programme.desc: Expect to fall in love with Woody Allens first musical, where wit and sophistication fuse in melodious harmony. With a star-studded cast, including, Julia Roberts, Drew Barrymore, Tim Roth, Goldie Hawn and Natalie Portman. Set in some of the worlds most romantic cities, this whirlwind of intertwining tales, focuses on one familys search for love. A romantic comedy that is unmissable!

programme.title: I Used To Go Here
programme.desc: A quirky coming-of-age story from the producers of Sorry to Bother You, starring Gillian Jacobs (Community) and Jemaine Clement (Flight of the Conchords). Her engagement is cancelled, her first book isn't doing well, and all her friends are having babies. Kate is in a real rut when she gets a call from her old university asking her to do a reading, where she gets sucked into college life again!

programme.title: Arctic
programme.desc: Full of shock turns and tense scenes, Arctic will keep you breathless until the end. Mads Mikkelsen (Hannibal) gives a tour de force performance as a pilot whose plane has crashed in a remote corner of the Arctic. Stranded in the wilderness he uses his ingenuity to survive. But the pilot is forced to make a perilous choice between the relative safety of his camp and a deadly trek into the unknown.

programme.title: The Last Witness
programme.desc: BAFTA Award Nominee Piotr Szkopiak directs this unmissable political thriller, based on the harrowing true events of the Katyn Massacre in Spring 1940. While investigating a spate of suicides by resettled Polish soldiers, ambitious journalist Stephen (Alex Pettyfer) is embroiled in a dangerous conspiracy concerning the execution of 22,000 Polish military and civilians by Stalin's secret police.

programme.title: Resistance: 1942
programme.desc: A tense, WWII-set cat and mouse thriller starring Cary Elwes (The Princess Bride), Greer Grammer (Awkward.), Jason Patric (Sleepers) and Oscar nominee Judd Hirsch (Independence Day). France, 1942. Under Nazi control, the Allies have been pushed off and Hitlers victory is nearly absolute. In hiding, Jacques radio broadcasts a message of hope. But a relentless Gestapo captain is out to catch him.

programme.title: Just Before I Go
programme.desc: Courteney Cox (Friends) directs this hysterical comedy drama starring Seann William Scott (American Pie) and Kate Walsh (The Perks of being a Wallflower). In an effort to move on, disgruntled 41-year-old divorcee Ted Morgan travels back to his hometown to face the people who have made him the man he is today. But little does he know, he has the chance to find new hope and love!

programme.title: A Town Called Hell
programme.desc: A group of Mexican revolutionaries murders a town priest and a number of his christian followers. Ten years later, a widow arrives in town intent to take revenge from her husband's killers.

programme.title: Pancho Villa
programme.desc: A double-cross in an arms deal prompts Mexican revolutionary Pancho Villa to raid a US Army weapons depot in Columbus, New Mexico.

programme.title: Blood Money
programme.desc: A martial artist joins a hard-hitting gunfighter in the search for treasure while bandits step into their way.

programme.title: Two Brothers in Trinity
programme.desc: After inheriting a land plot in a dusty place called Trinity, the antagonistic half-brothers, Lester and Jesse, reunite to pursue different aspirations, only to find themselves neck-deep in trouble. Will they ever fulfil their dreams?

programme.title: Arizona Colt Returns
programme.desc: Famed gunman Arizona Colt is sent by Moreno to rescue his daughter from the grips of Arizona's old enemy, Keane. But certain complications make the mission far more dangerous than expected.

programme.title: The Hellbenders
programme.desc: An ex-Confederate and his sons plan to use stolen money as a way to revive the Confederacy.

programme.title: Django Challenges Sartana
programme.desc: Framed for a bank robbery, bounty killer Django's brother, Steve is lynched.

programme.title: The Covered Wagon
programme.desc: Two wagon caravans converge at what is now Kansas City, and combine for the westward push to Oregon. On their quest the pilgrims will experience desert heat, mountain snow, hunger, and indian attack.

programme.title: Companeros!
programme.desc: A Swedish arms dealer and a Mexican peon team up to rescue the intellectual leader of the Revolutionary cause, while taking part in numerous misadventures along the way.

programme.title: Cattle Queen of Montana
programme.desc: Sierra Nevada Jones must fight a villainous rancher to regain the land that is rightfully hers.

programme.title: Bounty Hunter in Trinity
programme.desc: The townsfolk of Trinity decide to hire a notorious bounty hunter to protect them from a fierce band of Mexican outlaws who are terrorizing the area.

programme.title: Hell's Outpost
programme.desc: A Korean war veteran attempts to help a small town mine owner develop his tungsten mine in spite of efforts by the town boss to stop him.

programme.title: His Name Was Sam Walbash, But They Call Him Amen
programme.desc: A cruel and ruthless bandit kills a tavern owner who had ratted him out to the authorities.

programme.title: Long Live ... Your Death!
programme.desc: A self-proclaimed Russian prince, a Mexican bandit and a radical Irish female journalist team up during the Mexican Revolution to find fortune and notoriety.

programme.title: Don't Wait, Django... Shoot!
programme.desc: Django returns home to discover that his father has been killed by local bandits in a business deal gone wrong.

programme.title: Cripple Creek
programme.desc: Lawmen infiltrate bandit gang to catch mining crooks.

programme.title: A Gunfight
programme.desc: Two aging gunfighters in need of money come to an agreement to organize an actual showdown between them and sell tickets for it. The townsfolk is more than interested to see the "show".

programme.title: Quintana: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: In a Mexican province oppressed by the evil Governor Don Juan de Leyra, the rebel-outlaw Quintana is the sole guardian of justice.

programme.title: Beverly Hills Bandits
programme.desc: When bratty 5-year-old Byron Reed (Chris Williams) acts out the night before a family trip, his mother (Natasha Alam) makes him sit in the time out chair. When Byron awakens to an empty house, he assumes his wish to have no family has come true.

programme.title: The Henchman’s War
programme.desc: A deadly mistake sets an introspective henchman on a violent crusade against a mid-level crime boss with demons of his own.

programme.title: Sand Angels
programme.desc: Will Esperanza be able to show Tom the truth about his past, present and future? Will she be able to save all the young people in the world who suffer from depression near Christmas Time? Can Tom be convinced to make the most of his life whilst he has time?

programme.title: The Kiss of Lady X
programme.desc: A disgraced former secret agent risks his life as well as the lives of his ragtag team as he seeks revenge against the charismatic terrorist who killed his wife.

programme.title: The Kiss of Lady X
programme.desc: A disgraced former secret agent risks his life as well as the lives of his ragtag team as he seeks revenge against the charismatic terrorist who killed his wife.

programme.title: Ready, Willing and Able
programme.desc: Two songwriters want to cast a British star in their new show.

programme.title: The Wait
programme.desc: A mafia killer accepts to take the identity of his last victim in order to redeem his past. Two games of chess – one with his victim, the other with his boss – will stress the turning points of this change.

programme.title: In Critical Condition
programme.desc: Johnny, the loyal number two of a powerful sociopathic crime boss, leads other members of a small town mob scrambling to keep their business alive while trying to find the leak to the police.

programme.title: The Map Reader
programme.desc: In a small New Zealand town, 16 year-old Michael leads a lonely, introverted existence with his single mother Amelia whose guilt and alcoholism threatens to drive her cherished son away. Uncomfortable with the adolescent exploits of his “friends,” he finds escape through a passionate love of maps.

programme.title: The Henchman’s War
programme.desc: A deadly mistake sets an introspective henchman on a violent crusade against a mid-level crime boss with demons of his own.

programme.title: Admins
programme.desc: A day in the lives of two system admins named Dan and Randy as they annoy users, discuss office politics, and watch gophers at the coffee shop.

programme.title: Burn Your Name

programme.title: Delivering Milo

programme.title: New Rose Hotel

programme.title: Flesh Wounds
programme.desc: An elite team of soldiers have 24 hours to find a group of scientists that vanished from a US Army facility while conducting experiments on top secret weaponry.

programme.title: Point Blank
programme.desc: Mickey Rourke and Danny Trejo star in this action-packed drama about a gang of psychotic criminals who break out of prison and take control of a Texas shopping mall.

programme.title: Stuck Together

programme.desc: When a young basketball player becomes entangled with drug dealers, he turns to an ex-cop and former private eye. Starring Ice-T, Gary Busey, Fred Williamson and Jim Brown.

programme.desc: A sweet-talking con man (Bryan Brown) starts to turn his life around when he falls in love in this family-oriented comedy.

programme.title: Wicker Park
programme.desc: A young Chicago advertising executive believes a woman he sees in a café is his long-lost love. His belief leads to obsession, as he puts his life on hold in order to trail her.

programme.title: The Bone Snatcher
programme.desc: When four jewel hunters are found dead in the desert with the flesh stripped from their bodies, it's up to Dr. Zack Straker to find out what's gone wrong.

programme.title: Dahmer
programme.desc: Jeffrey Dahmer (Jeremy Renner, "The Hurt Locker") was vilified when authorities discovered he had murdered, dismembered and even tried to consume the bodies of 15 young men in Milwaukee.

programme.title: Five Nights in Maine
programme.desc: A man, reeling from the tragic loss of his wife, travels to rural Maine to seek answers from his estranged mother-in-law, who is herself confronting grief. With David Oyelowo and Dianne Wiest.

programme.title: Prom Night II: Hello Mary Lou
programme.desc: Thirty years after her death, the tortured spirit of prom queen Mary Lou Maloney returns for revenge.

programme.title: My Date With Drew
programme.desc: In this quirky documentary, an aspiring filmmaker documents his quest to land a date with his lifelong crush, Hollywood actress and Golden Globe winner Drew Barrymore.

programme.title: Bernie
programme.desc: In small-town Texas, an affable mortician (Jack Black, "School of Rock") strikes up a friendship with a wealthy widow, who soon becomes controlling.

programme.title: The Mystery of a Hansom Cab
programme.desc: One night in Victorian Melbourne, two gentlemen board a hanson cab...but only one emerges alive. A classic whodunnit adapted from the best-selling book of the same name.

programme.title: 18 Again!
programme.desc: In this fantasy comedy, an outcast teenager accidentally switches bodies with his 81-year-old bachelor grandfather.

programme.title: Invasion Of The Star Creatures
programme.desc: A pair of comical soldiers (Robert Ball and Frankie Ray) investigate a mysterious crater in an atomic detonation area and discover several beautiful alien vixens (Dolores Reed and Gloria Victor) who plan to conquer the world using an army of vegetable monsters.

programme.title: The Selling
programme.desc: A too-honest-for-his-own-good real estate agent has to sell a haunted house before its ghostly inhabitants ruin his life.

programme.title: Making a Killing
programme.desc: Three morticians get caught in a web of greed and deceit, involving buried treasure and a tangled love affair, in this modern day crime mystery that is based on a true story.

programme.title: Tim Timmerman: Hope Of America
programme.desc: An irresponsible Utah student body president faces impeachment as he attempts to sweet-talk his way into Yale.

programme.title: King Lear
programme.desc: King Lear is an in-depth study of love, power and death. Through this film Shakespeare is saying, "Don't blame the gods or the heaven's for the horrors committed on earth. No. Blame hellish inhumanity on those who inhabit the earth."

programme.title: Brave Are the Fallen
programme.desc: Heartfelt and inspiring, this award winning documentary chronicles firefighter Captain Tom Wall's life, and his untimely death while battling an inferno that he helped to ultimately put out, saving homes and lives one last time.

programme.title: Old Friends: A Dogumentary
programme.desc: Old Friends Senior Dog Sanctuary: A paw-inspiring tale of compassion as 100 senior dogs find their forever home in a 20,000 sq. ft. sanctuary. Love knows no bounds in this heartwarming story!

programme.title: Where Cars Don't Dare
programme.desc: Rediscover the gold rush trail in Mojave Desert on a thrilling dirt bike tour. 3 days, 460 miles, no roads. Unleash your adventure!

programme.title: Dispatches from Cleveland
programme.desc: DISPATCHES FROM CLEVELAND is a 5 chapter documentary focused on ordinary Clevelanders who have been long shaken by police misconduct, social discrimination, and poverty. Depicting intersecting movements in Cleveland, the series examines how residents' love for their hometown pushes them to work together to bring about real change in one of the most racially divided cities in America.

programme.title: Paddle to the Sea
programme.desc: This film recounts the adventures of a toy Native American canoe as it makes its way from the Great Lakes to the Atlantic Ocean.

programme.title: Luxury Travel Show - Season 1
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Luxury Travel Show - Season 1, 1. Chiang Mai & Eze
programme.desc: Nestled in the foothills of northern Thailand, Chiang Mai is the country's fifth largest city. Brimming with culture, beautiful architecture and stunning temples it's often considered a sanctuary away from Bangkok. In the South of France, nestled between Nice and Monte Carlo is the picture postcard town of Eze, where individual buildings are suits in the town's luxury hotel.

programme.title: Luxury Travel Show - Season 1
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Luxury Travel Show - Season 1, 2. Ice Hotel Sweden & Bangkok
programme.desc: Ever fancied spending a night in the Ice hotel? Well in this episode viewers get to view this breathtaking man-made winter wonderland and arctic activities guests can enjoy during their stay in Sweden. Then it's off to warmer climates to Thailand's capital - Bangkok.

programme.title: Bee Team 2
programme.desc: Rejoin the forest's tiniest adventurers, Zip and Zap, along with their always watchful Queen Eleanor and her right hand bee, Sabastian, as they prove once again that there's no team like the Bee Team!

programme.title: Decanted.: A Winemaker's Journey
programme.desc: Look inside one of the most intimate wine growing regions in the world, Napa Valley, as we follow the journey of new beginnings and mastering a craft.

programme.title: Wall
programme.desc: WALL follows David Hare on a trip to the Middle East to examine the impact the wall separating Israel and Palestine has had on the people of the region.

programme.title: Chosen By Love
programme.desc: A multi-plot film centered on adoption and foster care, Chosen follows 6 different families as they each discover an intertwined journey of healing, unity, and new beginnings.

programme.title: Egyptian Secrets at the Vatican
programme.desc: Come along with Curtis Ryan Woodside as he investigates the Egyptian influence, treasures and mysteries that reside in the Vatican.

programme.title: Not Since You
programme.desc: A romantic drama about a tight-knit group of college friends who graduated from NYU and reunite years later for a weekend wedding in Georgia.

programme.title: Ink
programme.desc: As the light fades and the city goes to sleep, two forces emerge. They are invisible except for the power they exert over us in our sleep, battling for our souls through dreams. One force delivers hope and strength through good dreams; the other infuses the subconscious with desperation through nightmares. John and Emma, Father and Daughter are wrenched into this fantastical dream world battle, forced to fight for John's soul and to save Emma from an eternal nightmare. Separate in their journey, they encounter unusual characters that exist only in their subconscious.

programme.title: Confessions of a Teenage Jesus Jerk
programme.desc: A teenage boy comes of age during the Reagan years, discovering that he really enjoys many pleasurable things that his family and his religion frown upon.

programme.title: The Past Never Dies
programme.desc: CASEY MARSH was born in captivity. Her mother, JANE, was abducted as a teenager and gave birth to Casey while she was being held by the kidnapper, TIMOTHY FAST. Jane eventually escaped when Casey was 6 years old. Timothy Fast was arrested and incarcerated. Ever since, Jane has struggled to regain a normal life for her and her daughter. For Casey, the memories of a childhood in captivity still haunt her. Jane, on the other hand, has seemingly moved on. She has re-married and is happy. When a number of local women start to go missing, Jane reveals to Casey that Timothy might have had an accomplice and wonders if he is involved. The kidnapping M.O. is eerily similar. Casey is furious that...

programme.desc: A writer returns to her hometown for inspiration and reinkindles her romance with her first love.

programme.title: Inconceivable
programme.desc: A woman interprets a kiss at a high school reunion as an invitation to follow her ex across the country and supplant his current family.

programme.title: What Would Jesus Do? The Journey Continues
programme.desc: The journey continues from What Would Jesus Do? (2010) as the drifter arrives into a new town inspiring a group of people to live as Jesus would.

programme.title: A Winter Rose: Directors Cut
programme.desc: After being diagnosed with cancer, a legendary singer, her manager and husband discover a gifted but troubled orphan to be her successor.

programme.title: Undercover Angel
programme.desc: When a little girl prays for a miracle to help her recently divorced mother settle in their new town and fixer-upper house, an angel posing as a handyman, is sent down from heaven to help. While trying to accomplish his mission, the angel falls for the mother, ultimately forcing him into the unlikeliest of choices.

programme.title: Fatal Defense
programme.desc: A single mother signs up for self-defense classes from a handsome instructor. But he develops a frightening obsession with her and orchestrates an increasing deadly array of "tests" to see if she has truly learned from his lessons.

programme.title: Hit and Run
programme.desc: A lawyer is riding high after putting a receiving a Not Guilty verdict for her client, but has to look over her shoulder when a woman she meets in a traffic accident is not all she appears to be.

programme.title: Inconceivable
programme.desc: A woman interprets a kiss at a high school reunion as an invitation to follow her ex across the country and supplant his current family.

programme.title: Basmati Blues
programme.desc: Linda Watt (Brie Larson: Room, 21 Jump Street) is a sheltered but brilliant young scientist who is plucked out of her company's lab and sent to India by her CEO (Donald Sutherland: The Hunger Games) to sell "Rice 9," a genetically modified rice she's created.

programme.title: First Daughter
programme.desc: Samantha Mackenzie (Katie Holmes) has fame and glamour, but she just wants what every college freshman wants: the opportunity to experience the world away from home, and most importantly, away from her parents. She just wants to be treated like anyone else; to be… normal.

programme.title: Little Italy
programme.desc: Former best friends Sal and Vince run rival pizzerias in Little Italy, spending their days plotting against each other's restaurant. But when love blossoms between Sal's daughter Nikki (Emma Roberts) and Vince's son Leo (Hayden Christensen), they must hide their romance from their oblivious fathers' eyes. When news of Nikki and Leo's relationship slips out into the open, Sal and Vince reach boiling point. These cobblestoned piazzas ain't big enough for two legendary pizzerias, so a wager is declared: the two restaurants will compete in a high stakes pizza cookout, where the loser must leave Little Italy for good.

programme.title: Blind (2017)
programme.desc: Bestselling novelist, Bill Oakland loses his wife and his sight in a vicious car crash. Five years later Socialite Suzanne Dutchman is forced to read to Bill in an intimate room three times a week as a plea bargain for being associated with her husband's insider trading.

programme.title: Say When
programme.desc: Megan (Keira Knightley) panics when her boyfriend proposes and hides out in the home of her new teenage friend Annika (Chloë Grace Moretz).

programme.title: Two Lovers
programme.desc: Leonard is an attractive but troubled young man living with his parents in suburban Brooklyn when two women enter his life. The lovely but ordinary daughter of his father’s new business partner and his beautiful but volatile neighbour trapped in a destructive affair, whose passion helps to reignite his lust for life.

programme.title: Programming will resume shortly
programme.desc: We're catching up on our beauty sleep! Stay tuned for more priceless entertainment curated by Rakuten TV.

programme.title: The Baby Proposal
programme.desc: Ambitious Layla Bennet co-hosts morning show Wake Up Chicago! with her handsome colleague Derek Dray. They don’t always see eye to eye, so when they suddenly must care for a baby together, it’s their worst nightmare! As they juggle night feeds with their hectic work lives, they can’t deny their growing chemistry… could this be love?

programme.title: Listen Out for Love
programme.desc: Peyton Pepper, a goal-driven podcast producer, is forced to mold Alex McKinney, a brash loose cannon, into her next star and create the perfect show to save both of their careers. That show comes in the form of finding Peyton’s iconic idol, true love. But as the duo goes along for the ride, they are the ones who find love--once they open their hearts and listen.

programme.title: Meet Me in New York
programme.desc: Kelly is a young, creative, ambitious events planner in New York City and quickly gaining a reputation as one of the best in the business. But when Joe, a stubborn, difficult, but influential website editor, hires her to organize his niece's 10th birthday party, Kelly quickly realizes that she may have just met her match.

programme.title: Dan In Real Life
programme.desc: Raising three young daughters single-handedly and juggling the problems of America as a respected advice columnist, Dan Burns (Steve Carell) would be the perfect father, if only he could follow his own advice. Dan in Real Life is the true definition of a feel-good comedy and features a brilliant ensemble cast that also includes Dane Cook, Emily Blunt, Dianne Wiest and John Mahoney.

programme.title: The Romantics
programme.desc: Love is tested over one raucous night when seven collage pals reunite to watch two of their own say ‘I do’. Based on the acclaimed novel by Galt Niederhoffer. Featuring an all star cast including Josh Duhamel, Malin Akerman, Adam Brody, Dianna Agron and Elijah Wood.

programme.title: Love Wrecked
programme.desc: Jenny Taylor (Amanda Bynes) has found her ideal man who she just knows would sweep her off her feet. The only problem? He's Jason Masters (Chris Carmack), the world's biggest rock star. Hoping for a chance to get close to her idol, Jenny takes a job in his favourite Caribbean resort with her best friend Ryan (Jonathan Bennett). When Jason is washed overboard in a storm, Jenny jumps in to save him and the pair find themselves stranded on a seemingly-deserted tropical island.

programme.title: The Song To My Heart
programme.desc: After a childhood on the road with her legendary singer-songwriter father, teashop owner BONNIE HIGHSTREET, wants nothing to do with the music business, but when she helps music sensation RYDER JAMISON, develop lyrics for his new solo album, she rekindles her long abandoned dream and falls in love.

programme.title: Swiped
programme.desc: A womanising college student (Noah Centineo) enlists his nerdy roommate (Kendall Sanders) to code the ultimate hook up app by offering to pay his tuition for MIT but unexpected consequences ensue.

programme.title: Romance Retreat
programme.desc: After a break-up, journalist Dana Willingham finds herself alone and stuck at a couple’s yoga retreat while the biggest story of her career breaks far away. But when she meets handsome fellow retreater Stefan Gonzales who’s lying low after being the center of a scandal, she smells a good story. As she gains his trust and the pair get closer, will she choose the perfect story or the perfect man?

programme.title: Olympic Dreams
programme.desc: Penelope is a first time Olympian and an introverted cross-country skier, who, after finishing her event early on in the games, finds herself spending time in Athletes Village with the gregarious and outgoing volunteer dentist, Ezra. While both are eager to form connections at the Olympic Games, they are held back by the very thing that has propelled them to this point; what do you do once your lifelong dream has come true, and you're faced with taking the next step? As Penelope and Ezra navigate the vulnerable slopes, they push one another to embrace qualities they lost sight of in pursuit of their dreams.

programme.title: About Us
programme.desc: A young couple revisit the location where they spent their honeymoon eight years earlier, in an effort to rekindle their troubled marriage. We watch as they navigate the beauty and the pain of love, culminating in a heartbreaking finale as truths are revealed.

programme.title: Date & Switch
programme.desc: High school seniors Michael and Matty have been best friends since 3rd grade. Still virgins, they make a pact to help each other "score" before Senior Prom - but their mission suddenly takes an unexpected turn when Matty announces that he's gay.

programme.title: Grand Isle
programme.desc: Vietnam veteran Walter Franklin (Nicolas Cage) lives alone with his wife (Kadee Strickland) in a Victorian house on a quiet island in Louisiana. Walter hires local handyman Buddy (Luke Benward) to fix his fence, but when a ferocious hurricane strikes the island Buddy finds himself trapped at the Franklins residence. As tensions rise, the night takes an expected turn.

programme.title: Repression
programme.desc: Repression is a gripping and twisty Hitchcock-esque thriller set in Scotland with a staller British cast, including Peter Mullan and Rebecca Front. When therapist Marianne moves to a remote area of Scotland, her attempts at a new life is thrown off course by one of her patients, ten year old Manny who claims he can see and control her future. Marianne struggles against both the wall of silence from her colleagues and her own mind as she tries to uncover the truth behind Manny’s drawings.

programme.title: The Bygone
programme.desc: When a young Lakota woman goes missing in the oil fields of North Dakota, a cowboy's pursuit leads him into a dark unforgiving world of greed, violence and trafficking. In his attempt to save the damsel in distress, the rancher uncovers a harrowing past and hints at a dire future.

programme.title: Runner Runner
programme.desc: Princeton grad student Richie (Justin Timberlake), believing he’s been swindled, travels to Costa Rica to confront online gambling tycoon Ivan Block (Ben Affleck). Richie is seduced by Block’s promise of immense wealth, until he learns the disturbing truth about his benefactor. When the FBI tries to coerce Richie to help bring down Block, Richie faces his biggest gamble ever: attempting to outmaneuver the two forces closing in on him.

programme.title: All I See is You
programme.desc: The film follows the story of a blind woman (portrayed by Blake Lively) and her husband (Jason Clarke). When her sight unexpectedly returns, she begins to discover the previously unseen and disturbing details about themselves, their marriage and their lives.

programme.title: State Like Sleep
programme.desc: This film contains a sequence of flashing lights which might affect customers who are susceptible to photosensitive epilepsy. One year after the sudden death of her celebrity husband, Katherine Grand receives a phone call that pulls her back to Brussels and the life there that she's tried to forget. Once back, she discovers a web of secrets that compel her to unravel the mysteries surrounding Stefan's last days alive.

programme.title: Acts of Violence
programme.desc: How far would you go for the one you love? For the MacGregor brothers, that question becomes a life-or-death decision that tests their strength, courage, and sense of family. When Mia, the fiancée of Roman MacGregor, is abducted into a human trafficking ring, Roman and brothers Brendan and Deklan decide to save Mia on their own. They’re guided by Det. Avery, the cop on the case whose sense of duty will be pushed to its limits and challenged by his colleague on the case Det. Brooke Baker. As the MacGregors sidestep official boundaries to rescue Mia, every second counts. But are they prepared for the ACTS OF VIOLENCE they’re about to experience?

programme.title: Badge of Honor
programme.desc: After arresting her own partner and testifying against him, police officer Jessica Dawson (Mena Suvari) is forced to transfer to Internal Affairs to investigate a teen’s suspicious killing by police officer's Mike (Jessie Bradford), David (Lochlyn Munro) and their overly-optimistic police captain (Martin Sheen) all while trying to avoid being killed herself. All these lives converge in a whirlwind of crime and deceit in this modern-day police thriller.

programme.title: 4 Minute Mile
programme.desc: A former track coach decides to train a student with natural athletic talent. Tragedy strikes right before the biggest race of his life, forcing him to confront everything that has been holding him back.

programme.title: Voice from the Stone
programme.desc: A haunting horror thriller set in an isolated castle in 1950s Tuscany, Voice From the Stone tells the story of Verena (Emilia Clarke: TV’s Game of Thrones, Me Before You), a determined young nurse who is hired to aid a boy through the trauma of his mother's sudden death. As she works with the troubled boy, she falls under the spell of a malevolent force inside the castle.

programme.title: The Captive
programme.desc: Eight years after the disappearance of Cassandra, some disturbing incidents seem to indicate that she's still alive. Police, parents and Cassandra herself, will try to unravel the mystery of her disappearance.

programme.title: Centigrade
programme.desc: Centigrade is a high-intensity, high concept survival thriller based on chilling true events. A married couple find themselves trapped in their frozen vehicle after a blizzard and struggle to survive amid plunging temperatures and unforeseen obstacles. At -40 degrees your lungs freeze and time is running out…

programme.title: The Birthday Cake
programme.desc: On one fateful evening, Gio, the son of a murdered mobster and the nephew of Brooklyn mob boss Angelo, carries on the family tradition of bringing a cake his mother baked to his uncle’s house for a celebration. Just two hours into the night, Gio’s life is forever changed as he begins to piece together what really happened to his father and ultimately comes face to face with the type of violence he has managed to avoid his whole life.

programme.title: A Brixton Tale
programme.desc: Wealthy vlogger Leah (Lily Newmark - Sex Education, Misbehaviour) chooses shy youth Benji (Ola Orebiyi - Limbo, Cherry) as the subject of her Brixton documentary. They fall for each other, but the desire for edgy footage leads them down a violent path. A BRIXTON TALE is a powerful and thrilling film, also starring Jaime Winstone, Craige Middleburg, Barney Harris, Michael Maloney and Dexter Padmore.

programme.title: Lizzie
programme.desc: 'Lizzie' is a dark, psychodrama based on the infamous 1892 axe murder of the Borden family in Fall River, Massachusetts. The film explores Lizzie Borden's life, focusing on the period leading up to the murders and their immediate aftermath—and reveals many layers of the strange, fragile woman who stood accused of the brutal crime. As an unmarried woman of 32, and a social outcast, Lizzie lives a claustrophobic life under her father's cold and domineering control. When Bridget Sullivan, a young maid, comes to work for the family, Lizzie finds a sympathetic, kindred spirit, and a chance intimacy that blossoms into a wicked plan, and a dark, unsettling end.

programme.title: Stone
programme.desc: Academy-Award winner Robert De Niro and Academy-Award nominee Edward Norton deliver powerful performances as a seasoned corrections official and a scheming inmate whose lives become dangerously intertwined in this thought-provoking drama.

programme.title: Misconduct
programme.desc: SIMULTANEOUS RELEASE. ON CINEMAS NOW! When an ambitious young lawyer takes on a case against a powerful and ruthless executive of a large pharmaceutical company, he soon finds himself at the centre of a case of blackmail and corruption. With an all-star cast including Josh Duhamel, Al Pacino, Anthony Hopkins, Alice Eve, Malin Akerman and Julia Stiles, Misconduct is a smart, slick thriller packed with twists and dark secrets.

programme.title: The Nutcracker
programme.desc: 1920s Vienna. Nine-year-old Mary lives in a home filled with lovely things and loneliness. Bothered by bratty brother Max and neglected by well intentioned, but distracted, parents, she yearns for companionship and adventure. On Christmas Eve, Mary's beloved Uncle Albert arrives with the gift of a wooden nutcracker doll. Later that night, Mary's imagination brings the doll to life. Introducing himself as "NC," he takes her on a wondrous journey through a stunning dimension where toys assume human form and everything appears ten times larger. But danger lurks.

programme.title: Lost Treasure of Jesse James
programme.desc: When their family homes are threatened by a local land developer, a group of youngsters set out to locate the mysterious James brothers' treasure, a legend that may just save Ford county and allow them to keep their family homes forever.

programme.title: The Daltons - Season 1 - Jailbreak for Dummies | Hostage Havoc | The Informer
programme.desc: Joe is so fed up with his endless failures to escape that he feels blue. He doesn’t even want to try anymore. Everyone notices how listless he is, no reactions, no appetite … he’s not even complaining! Peabody decides to intervene. He can’t have depressed inmates in his prison! What about his reputation? And if the Daltons stop trying to escape, he won’t qualify for those extra founds he relies on…

programme.title: Winx Club
programme.desc: The Winx Club returns for their second year at Alfea and encounter an exhausted fairy.

Will the rest of the Cry Babies Magic Tears be able to help Narvie control his powers? Don't miss this new episode of Cry Babies in English and find out the end of this magic story!
